translation.en: [Splinter] You are extraordinary, my sons.
translation.zh: 你们是无与伦比的 我的孩子们

translation.en: Unlike anything the world has ever seen.
translation.zh: 是这世界上独一无二的

translation.en: Bound for greatness,
translation.zh: 肩负着神圣的使命

translation.en: destined to protect the people of New York.
translation.zh: 这个使命就是要保护纽约的市民

translation.en: A dark force is growing,
translation.zh: 一股邪恶势力正在蔓延

translation.en: a criminal organization known as the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: 这就是臭名昭著的犯罪团伙大脚帮

translation.en: So named because they step over
translation.zh: 名字的由来是因为他们

translation.en: the good people of this city with no regard.
translation.zh: 对民众的生命肆意践踏 毫无怜悯

translation.en: Their leader, The Shredder, will come at you with ferocity.
translation.zh: 领头的叫史莱德 心狠手辣

translation.en: His Foot Clan will outnumber you.
translation.zh: 他的手下人多势众

translation.en: The people of New York will look upon you as their only hope.
translation.zh: 而你们将成为纽约市民唯一的希望

translation.en: Eyes focused. Elbows locked. -Stance low. -[blades swishing]
translation.zh: 紧紧盯住目标 双肘要稳 重心要低

translation.en: And we begin.
translation.zh: 我们开始

translation.en: Be one with the blades. Lead their path.
translation.zh: 跟刀融为一体 意在刀先

translation.en: I know you are eager to answer their calls,
translation.zh: 我知道你们很想回应他们的呼唤 但是你们的训练还没完成

translation.en: but your training is not yet complete.
translation.zh: 但是你们的训练还没完成

translation.en: The world below must remain your home.
translation.zh: 还得暂时呆在这个地下世界

translation.en: As your father, you must trust me.
translation.zh: 我是你们的师父 一定要相信我

translation.en: Patience. Patience.
translation.zh: 忍耐 再忍耐

translation.en: You're not yet ready to go above ground.
translation.zh: 你们还没准备好到地面上去

translation.en: But I believe when that day comes,
translation.zh: 但我相信 一旦时机成熟

translation.en: and you rise to the streets,
translation.zh: 你们会到街道上去

translation.en: you are going to be responsible for amazing things.
translation.zh: 去干一番惊天动地的大事

translation.en: [April] Mr. Rivetti! Mr. Rivetti. Mr. Rivetti, please.
translation.zh: 瑞瓦提先生 等一下

translation.en: You're the most persistent human I've ever met in my life, I swear.
translation.zh: 我说 你是我见过的最难缠的人

translation.en: Look, I already told the cops everything, all right?
translation.zh: 听着 我都告诉警察了 明白吗？

translation.en: But maybe there's a detail you could've forgotten to share with the police.
translation.zh: 也许有些细节你忘了告诉警察呢？

translation.en: Sweetheart, you don't forget something like that.
translation.zh: 宝贝儿 我不会忘记细节的

translation.en: Ten guys storm in here, broad daylight,
translation.zh: 我们被十个人用枪指着头

translation.en: force us to the ground at gunpoint.
translation.zh: 趴在地上一动也不敢动

translation.en: And these are restricted chemicals.
translation.zh: 那可是危险化学物品

translation.en: Benzyl cyanide and some deaminating agents, too.
translation.zh: 苄基氰和脱氨基制剂

translation.en: You don't just buy this stuff, even on the black market.
translation.zh: 就算是在黑市上都不可能买到的

translation.en: Wait, you said deaminating agents, those are used in genetic research.
translation.zh: 等等 脱氨基制剂是用于遗传学研究

translation.en: Is there anybody else that's trafficking these sort of chemicals besides you?
translation.zh: 除了你们之外 还有其他人有这些化学物品吗？

translation.en: [Mr. Rivetti] There's one other high-security facility along this waterfront.
translation.zh: 在岸边还有一家戒备森严的机构

translation.en: But they don't move nearly as much cargo as we do.
translation.zh: 但他们的货运量没有我们这么多

translation.en: O'Neil! We're live in 30 minutes! Come on!
translation.zh: 奥尼尔 三十分钟后开始直播 快点

translation.en: No, no, no, I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 好吧 我马上回来

translation.en: Please don't go anywhere. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 别走开 我马上回来

translation.en: Come on, you're killing me.
translation.zh: 快点儿 真受不了你

translation.en: [April] I'm working.
translation.zh: 我在工作

translation.en: -That's a paying job? -No. Because we have an actual paying job.
translation.zh: –那是工作吗？正经事还忙不过来呢–不

translation.en: Look, you don't think that every crime reporter in the city
translation.zh: 难道你不知道所有报道罪案的记者

translation.en: has been trying to work this Foot Clan story?
translation.zh: 都在报道大脚帮的故事吗？

translation.en: I know that, but there is a new angle on this,
translation.zh: 这我知道 但我有新的角度

translation.en: and I am this close to getting it. I just need a couple of more...
translation.zh: 非常接近了 不骗你 我只需要

translation.en: Let's just stick to what we're good at.
translation.zh: 还是干我们拿手的吧

translation.en: Let's stick to what we're good at. We're good at it.
translation.zh: 我们擅长这个 开工吧

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -In five, four...
translation.zh: 五 四

translation.en: Hi, guys, this is April O'Neil from Channel 6 News,
translation.zh: 大家好 六频道的爱普尔·奥尼尔

translation.en: and I am here in beautiful New York City
translation.zh: 在美丽的纽约又和大家见面了

translation.en: on the first day of spring. And you know what that means.
translation.zh: 今天是纽约春天的开始

translation.en: It is time to shed that pesky winter weight.
translation.zh: 该甩掉整个冬天累积的脂肪了

translation.en: And here with me today
translation.zh: 站在我身边的是

translation.en: is celebrity fitness trainer Harley Pasternak.
translation.zh: 著名健身教练哈利·帕斯耐

translation.en: -Hi, Harley. -Good morning, April.
translation.zh: –你好 哈利–早上好 爱普尔

translation.en: Twenty years I've studied the animal kingdom.
translation.zh: 我研究了二十年动物

translation.en: There are fat pigs, there are fat cows. There are no fat birds.
translation.zh: 有肥猪 肥牛 却没有肥鸟

translation.en: All right, I want you to visualize a sexy seagull.
translation.zh: 你要想象自己是一只性感的海鸥

translation.en: So we're going to squat down, and flap your wings.
translation.zh: 先蹲下 然后展开翅膀

translation.en: Right over there. Full extension.
translation.zh: 像我这样用力伸展

translation.en: Picture you're leaving the cold north
translation.zh: 想象自己正在离开北方

translation.en: and you're flying. You're migrating.
translation.zh: 为了迁徙而飞翔

translation.en: Four years of journalism school so that I can do that.
translation.zh: 学了四年新闻专业却来干这个

translation.en: Four years of my life, Vern.
translation.zh: 四年的大好时光啊 弗恩

translation.en: It's embarrassing.
translation.zh: 真悲哀

translation.en: Look, O'Neil, I get it,
translation.zh: 听着 我知道 奥尼尔

translation.en: you want to be a serious journalist.
translation.zh: 你想当个正经的记者

translation.en: I see you sniffing around the newsroom for the big stories.
translation.zh: 我看到你在四处寻找大新闻

translation.en: But it's also okay to just give people something a little lighter.
translation.zh: 放松点儿 让大家也跟你轻松一下就像泡沫一样

translation.en: -A little... Little froth. -Froth?
translation.zh: 让大家也跟你轻松一下就像泡沫一样

translation.en: You know how when you get a coffee, it's just, like, coffee,
translation.zh: –泡沫–就是喝咖啡的时候

translation.en: then they put a little froth on it. It's kind of nice.
translation.zh: 咖啡上有层泡沫 很好喝的

translation.en: Vern, that's foam.
translation.zh: 弗恩 那叫奶泡 对

translation.en: Yes, foam, froth, you get the point.
translation.zh: 奶泡 泡沫 你说的没错

translation.en: It's just... It's nice, it tastes good, it's candy.
translation.zh: 味道没错 很甜 像糖一样

translation.en: You ever heard the expression, "Never take candy from a baby"?
translation.zh: 你就没听过吗？ 别抢宝宝的糖果

translation.en: It's because even babies love candy!
translation.zh: 因为宝宝都喜欢糖果

translation.en: It's nice, and you're giving people something they like that's good and nice.
translation.zh: 很好 你带给大家他们喜欢看的东西

translation.en: They look at you and they see,
translation.zh: 大家看到你就会想

translation.en: "Wow, there's a nice... There's...
translation.zh: 哇 真是赏心悦目

translation.en: candy." The point is, I think that
translation.zh: 关键是 我认为 你应该犒赏自己

translation.en: you should be rewarded, not punishing yourself. Okay?
translation.zh: 关键是 我认为 你应该犒赏自己 而不是惩罚自己

translation.en: And I'm... I'm prepared to reward you.
translation.zh: 现在让我来犒赏你吧

translation.en: I say that we go to my buddy's old restaurant downtown.
translation.zh: 我们去我朋友在城区开的餐厅

translation.en: -It's very vibey-- -We just ate on the way over here.
translation.zh: 那儿气氛很好 我们在来的路上已经吃过了

translation.en: No, I know we just... I'm not saying
translation.zh: 不 我不是说要吃大餐

translation.en: for a full meal, we're just gonna eat appetizers.
translation.zh: 是吃点开胃菜

translation.en: [April] I gotta go finish that interview. I'll see you at the office, Vern!
translation.zh: 我还要去完成那个采访 明天上班见

translation.en: I will see you at the office! [scoffs]
translation.zh: 那好吧 上班见

translation.en: [April] I just wanted to follow up, Mr. Rivetti.
translation.zh: 我想再跟您谈谈 瑞瓦提先生

translation.en: Are you kidding me? How did you get my number?
translation.zh: 见鬼 你怎么会有我的电话

translation.en: If I could just ask one more question.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我想再问一个问题 听着 我知道的事情全都告诉你了等等

translation.en: Listen, I already told you everything I know about this crime, everything.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道的事情全都告诉你了等等

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait.
translation.zh: 等一等

translation.en: Okay, you wanna know anything else,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果还有什么问题

translation.en: you go back down to the docks and you see my guy Stan.
translation.zh: 去码头找个叫斯坦的家伙

translation.en: He'll tell you anything else you need to know, okay?
translation.zh: 去他那儿找你的答案 好吗？ 谢谢

translation.en: And hey, do me a favor. Lose my number, all right?
translation.zh: 还有 拜托了 别再找我 好吗？

translation.en: -Good. -[Foot soldier] It's clear. Let's open it up.
translation.zh: –没错–全都打开 硝基乙烷

translation.en: Container's good. Move on to the next one.
translation.zh: 全都装到车上去

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Move it out! Get those to the trucks now!
translation.zh: 动作快点儿 都搬到卡车上

translation.en: [distantly] Move out, next point! Go, go, go.
translation.zh: 快点儿 去下一处 快

translation.en: -[man] Channel 6. -Chris.
translation.zh: -你好 六频道-克里斯

translation.en: Chris, it's April. I'm at the docks.
translation.zh: 克瑞斯 我现在在码头这儿

translation.en: We're in the middle of the evening brief, O'Neil.
translation.zh: 我这儿正在播出晚间新闻

translation.en: -Whatever you got can wait for tomorrow. -No, no, I need a camera crew--
translation.zh: 不管有什么事明天再说 克瑞斯 你听我说

translation.en: [Foot soldier 3, faintly] 2-3-2, clear!
translation.zh: 快点儿

translation.en: [Foot soldier 1] That one's loaded. Get it out of my way.
translation.zh: 那个装好了 –都装好了–我们走吧

translation.en: [Foot soldier 4] Copy that.
translation.zh: –都装好了–我们走吧

translation.en: [April sighs] Damn it.
translation.zh: 光线过暗 不

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Unit two, area three, move!
translation.zh: 第二队三区 行动

translation.en: [Foot soldier 3] I've got movement!
translation.zh: 这里有动静

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Keep your eyes over here! Weapons free!
translation.zh: 大家注意 格杀勿论

translation.en: Hold position!
translation.zh: 注意警戒

translation.en: Retreat! Retreat!
translation.zh: 撤退 快撤 快

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Get out of here!
translation.zh: 快撤 快 快离开这儿

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 真该死

translation.en: [April] Taylor. Taylor!
translation.zh: 泰勒

translation.en: [Taylor] Hey. I'm Skyping with my mom.
translation.zh: 我在跟妈妈视频呢

translation.en: You have no idea what I just went through.
translation.zh: 你绝对想不到我刚才看到什么了

translation.en: I am freaking out. I saw a Foot Clan attack.
translation.zh: 你绝对想不到我刚才看到什么了 -大脚帮被袭击了-你没事吧

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: -大脚帮被袭击了-你没事吧

translation.en: I was riding my bike by the docks.
translation.zh: 我正沿着码头骑自行车

translation.en: It was night, it's dark already,
translation.zh: 当时天黑了 我看见到处都是大脚帮的人

translation.en: and there are Foot Clan soldiers everywhere.
translation.zh: 我看见到处都是大脚帮的人

translation.en: Then out of nowhere, there was this guy fighting back against them.
translation.zh: 接着突然有个家伙冒出来袭击他们

translation.en: And he... he left behind this symbol.
translation.zh: 还留下了标记 我肯定曾经见过

translation.en: And I know that I've seen it before. I can't remember where.
translation.zh: 还留下了标记 我肯定曾经见过 只是不记得在哪里

translation.en: But there is someone fighting back against the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: 但肯定是有人出来对抗大脚帮

translation.en: There is a vigilante in this city.
translation.zh: 这个城市有正义使者

translation.en: And no one knows, but I do.
translation.zh: 谁都不知道 但我知道

translation.en: I know. And now I have my story.
translation.zh: 现在我有独家新闻了

translation.en: There is no more froth and foam for me.
translation.zh: 再也不用管什么泡沫 奶泡的

translation.en: What? Never mind.
translation.zh: –什么–当我没说

translation.en: [Thompson] All right, we need a lead for tonight. Who's got it?
translation.zh: 好了 今晚的新闻还缺个头条 谁有

translation.en: "Major redevelopments proposed for lower Manhattan."
translation.zh: 曼哈顿即将修缮南部城区 不行

translation.en: I got something. "NYPD task force taking credit
translation.zh: 我这儿有一个 大脚帮略有收敛 纽约警方特别行动组功不可没

translation.en: "for small decline in Foot-related crime."
translation.zh: 纽约警方特别行动组功不可没

translation.en: -I like that. Let's run with that. -Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 这还不错 就用这个吧

translation.en: [stage manager] Attention, 7:00 a.m. broadcast, we have three minutes to air.
translation.zh: 七点早新闻三分钟后开始播出

translation.en: Oh, O'Neil. I'll talk to you in a minute.
translation.zh: 奥尼尔 有事待会儿再说

translation.en: No, I... I know that I'm actually overstepping my boundaries by being here, but I think that you're gonna
translation.zh: 不 我知道我这样越权了

translation.en: want to hear what I have to say.
translation.zh: 但我觉得你一定会感兴趣的

translation.en: I actually think that you're all gonna want to hear what I have to say.
translation.zh: 我觉得你们大家都会感兴趣的

translation.en: Um, I witnessed
translation.zh: 昨晚我亲眼看到

translation.en: an attempted Foot Clan robbery at the docks in Brooklyn last night.
translation.zh: 大脚帮在布鲁克林的码头试图抢劫

translation.en: Hold on, the scanner said that gunshots were heard,
translation.zh: 等等 昨天晚上是监测到有枪声

translation.en: but there were no reports of any Foot Clan activity.
translation.zh: 但并没有看到大脚帮活动的报告

translation.en: That's because whatever they were attempting to do was stopped.
translation.zh: 那是因为他们犯罪活动时被阻止了

translation.en: What were you doing in Brooklyn anyway?
translation.zh: 你到布鲁克林去干什么

translation.en: Was there a trampoline convention?
translation.zh: 难道那儿有蹦床大会吗？

translation.en: -[people chuckle] -I was in Brooklyn because I was reporting,
translation.zh: 我到布鲁克林是为了跑新闻

translation.en: not sitting behind my desk, McNaughton.
translation.zh: 而不是坐在办公室里等着发霉

translation.en: Okay, kids!
translation.zh: 好了 别吵了 谁阻止的

translation.en: Well, there was this guy.
translation.zh: 那个人我看得不是很清楚

translation.en: I didn't see him clearly, but he was swinging
translation.zh: 那个人我看得不是很清楚 他用大集装箱把这些人撞到河里

translation.en: these giant shipping containers
translation.zh: 他用大集装箱把这些人撞到河里

translation.en: and knocking these guys into the... into the river.
translation.zh: 他用大集装箱把这些人撞到河里 反正有一个正义使者正在反击大脚帮

translation.en: There is a vigilante that is fighting back against the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: 反正有一个正义使者正在反击大脚帮 这绝对是个大新闻

translation.en: There's a huge story here!
translation.zh: 这绝对是个大新闻

translation.en: O'Neil, I think you found Superman. That's cool.
translation.zh: 奥尼尔 我看你是发现超人了 真酷

translation.en: The vigilante is real. I saw him.
translation.zh: 真的有正义使者 我看见了

translation.en: O'Neil, I'm gonna assume
translation.zh: 奥尼尔 如果我是你 没有明确证据

translation.en: that you would not come up here and tell us
translation.zh: 奥尼尔 如果我是你 没有明确证据 我绝对不会跑到大家面前

translation.en: this fantastic story without some tangible proof.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会跑到大家面前 讲这些不着边际的话

translation.en: I took this photo on one of the shipping containers.
translation.zh: 我拍了一张 那个集装箱的照片

translation.en: I actually think that it may be his calling card.
translation.zh: 我认为这应该是他的标记

translation.en: [scoffs] This is nothing, O'Neil. This is nothing!
translation.zh: 这说明不了什么 根本就不算证据

translation.en: That's exactly the point.
translation.zh: 这就是问题的关键

translation.en: Somebody stopped a Foot robbery and left no evidence.
translation.zh: 有人阻止了大脚帮犯案 但没留下证据 什么都没有

translation.en: There is nothing.
translation.zh: 但没留下证据 什么都没有

translation.en: Oh, I get it.
translation.zh: 我明白了

translation.en: You wanted me to put "nothing"
translation.zh: 你希望我的晚间新闻里是什么都没有

translation.en: -on the nightly news. -Of course not.
translation.zh: 你希望我的晚间新闻里是什么都没有 当然不是

translation.en: You know, I'm gonna pretend we never had this conversation.
translation.zh: 我可以当作这件事我们没谈过

translation.en: I'm erasing it from my mind.
translation.zh: 把它从记忆里抹干净

translation.en: And the rest of us, we're gonna go back to work. Let's hit it!
translation.zh: 让大家继续忙自己的工作 都工作吧

translation.en: [woman] Okay, we're ready with the Casper story.
translation.zh: 我们准备好专案组的报道了

translation.en: [anchorman] Hello, everybody. Welcome to the Channel 6 Morning News.
translation.zh: 早上好 欢迎收看六频道早新闻

translation.en: New developments in that ongoing sanitation strike to tell you about.
translation.zh: 纽约环卫工人的罢工活动又有新进展

translation.en: But first, after reviewing the city's soaring crime rates with the police commissioner,
translation.zh: 首先 在与警方高层探讨了 六频道新闻

translation.en: Councilman Dan Gregor took to the steps of City Hall,
translation.zh: 本市居高不下的犯罪率之后 市议员丹格雷戈在市政厅外发表讲话

translation.en: reaffirming the city's commitment to fight against the rising crime organization
translation.zh: 将全力打击这个日渐严重的犯罪团伙

translation.en: calling themselves the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: 纽约警方与萨克斯集团合作

translation.en: He did so on the heels of a renewed contract
translation.zh: 他们自称为大脚帮 并与埃里克·萨克斯

translation.en: with Eric Sacks and Sacks Industries.
translation.zh: 纽约警察跟萨克斯工业合作 及萨克斯集团签了新的合约

translation.en: Using the Sacks research and securities technology,
translation.zh: 运用萨克斯的研究成果和安保技术

translation.en: this city greatly improves its chances of bringing the Foot Clan to justice!
translation.zh: 我们将提高将大脚帮绳之以法的机会

translation.en: Begin!
translation.zh: 开始吧

translation.en: Your men are weak.
translation.zh: 太弱了

translation.en: It's no surprise your missions fail.
translation.zh: 难怪你们会失败

translation.en: [in English] We couldn't have anticipated the vigilante
translation.zh: 我们没料到正义使者会出现在码头上

translation.en: showing up at the docks, Master Shredder.
translation.zh: 我们没料到正义使者会出现在码头上 史莱德大师

translation.en: You have been trained for such contingencies.
translation.zh: 你们学过如何处理这种情况

translation.en: [in English] But we've never seen an enemy like this.
translation.zh: 但我们从没见过这样的对手

translation.en: Their size. Their strength.
translation.zh: 他们的个头 他们的力量

translation.en: They're not human.
translation.zh: 那不是人类

translation.en: I don't believe in fairy tales.
translation.zh: 我从不相信神话故事

translation.en: It's what society wants to reduce the Foot Clan to,
translation.zh: 他们的目的是要打压大脚帮的威望

translation.en: a myth.
translation.zh: 真幼稚

translation.en: But the Foot Clan
translation.zh: 我们大脚帮

translation.en: will rise again.
translation.zh: 岂会任人宰割

translation.en: Capture the vigilantes however you can.
translation.zh: 要不惜一切手段 抓住正义使者

translation.en: Use innocent people as bait.
translation.zh: 用无辜的民众做诱饵

translation.en: No one will stop us in our quest to reclaim victory.
translation.zh: 没有人能阻止大脚帮去夺取胜利

translation.en: We will own this city.
translation.zh: 我们将掌控这座城市

translation.en: [announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, please join me
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 欢迎纽约警方最大的捐助者

translation.en: in welcoming the NYPD's top benefactor,
translation.zh: 欢迎纽约警方最大的捐助者

translation.en: Eric Sacks.
translation.zh: 埃里克·萨克斯先生

translation.en: -[crowd applauding] -[Sacks chuckling]
translation.zh: 晚上好

translation.en: [Sacks] Please, please. Please.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Sit down, sit down.
translation.zh: 请坐

translation.en: I have to say, it's wonderful to see so many people out here tonight,
translation.zh: 今晚我很高兴看到这么多朋友光临

translation.en: especially in a neighborhood so hard hit by the Foot's crime wave.
translation.zh: 特别是在大脚帮犯罪非常猖獗的地区

translation.en: Years ago, my life was touched by tragedy.
translation.zh: 多年前 我遭遇了一场人生悲剧

translation.en: I was a young scientist working with a world-class team
translation.zh: 当时我正在和一个世界级的团队

translation.en: on cutting-edge research.
translation.zh: 研究尖端技术

translation.en: And our laboratory was attacked,
translation.zh: 我们的实验室遭到了攻击

translation.en: set fire to, robbed by the cowards that call themselves the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: 一伙自称大脚帮的歹徒放火抢劫

translation.en: Several of my employees...
translation.zh: 我的好几个员工

translation.en: lost their lives that day.
translation.zh: 因此失去了生命

translation.en: And it is in their honor, in their memory,
translation.zh: 为了向他们致敬 缅怀他们

translation.en: that Sacks Industries, whether through Sacks Biomed,
translation.zh: 萨克斯集团旗下不管是生物医学

translation.en: Sacks Robotics, or Sacks Construction,
translation.zh: 机械工程 还是建筑事业

translation.en: will remain committed to keeping the city of New York, our city,
translation.zh: 都将继续守护我们纽约市的安全

translation.en: So whenever someone takes flame to this city,
translation.zh: 如果有人敢在这里为非作歹

translation.en: I will be there to put the fire out.
translation.zh: 我就一定要把他们全都消灭

translation.en: And that's a promise. Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我对天发誓 谢谢

translation.en: [man] Great work, sir. Very inspirational.
translation.zh: 多谢光临 照顾不周 多包涵

translation.en: Mr. Sacks. April O'Neil. You worked with my father.
translation.zh: 萨克斯先生 爱普尔·奥尼尔 家父曾是您的同事

translation.en: I can't believe it. I haven't seen you since...
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 上一次见到你是在

translation.en: [April] Since his funeral. It was a long time ago.
translation.zh: 我爸爸的葬礼上 好久以前的事了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I just wanted to tell you that your words
translation.zh: 我只想告诉你

translation.en: really resonated with me, and I hope to one day
translation.zh: 你说的话让我很有同感 我希望有一天

translation.en: contribute to the city in the way that you do.
translation.zh: 像你一样对这城市有所贡献

translation.en: Well, it looks like you're doing a pretty good job.
translation.zh: 看来你已经做得很不错了

translation.en: Channel 6, very impressive, April.
translation.zh: 六频道 印象非常深刻

translation.en: Um... Thank you. It's, uh...
translation.zh: 多谢夸奖 其实这份工作

translation.en: It isn't exactly everything I anticipated it would be.
translation.zh: 多谢夸奖 其实这份工作 跟我之前想的完全不一样

translation.en: As long as you are true to yourself,
translation.zh: 只要你坚持自己的理想

translation.en: your father will always be proud of you.
translation.zh: 你父亲一定会为你骄傲的

translation.en: Mr. Sacks, we have to be uptown at 7:00.
translation.zh: 萨克斯先生 我们七点要赶到市区

translation.en: I'll see you on TV.
translation.zh: 我会看你的节目

translation.en: [April] Eric Sacks was so inspiring.
translation.zh: 他让我很受鼓舞

translation.en: I know this is a story that actually matters.
translation.zh: 我知道 这是个很有价值的新闻

translation.en: The superhero one?
translation.zh: 那个超级英雄

translation.en: That's a good idea. I should chase that down.
translation.zh: 好主意 应该查一查

translation.en: Where's everybody going?
translation.zh: 他们要去哪儿

translation.en: -[door opens] -O'Neil! Where are you going?
translation.zh: 奥尼尔 你要去哪儿

translation.en: -[April] Hey, hey. -[Vern] April! [April] What are you running from? Wait, wait, wait!
translation.zh: -奥尼尔-你们为什么要跑 等一下

translation.en: [dispatch] Shots fired, Broadway and Center Street.
translation.zh: 百老汇街和中央街发生枪击

translation.en: [Donatello] Surveillance uplinks are showing heavy,
translation.zh: 监控显示

translation.en: heavy Foot Clan activity at the Broad Street platform.
translation.zh: 大脚帮在百老汇街车站有大规模行动

translation.en: [Raphael] They're taking hostages, dude.
translation.zh: 他们还挟持了人质

translation.en: [Leonardo] But you know we're not supposed to go above ground.
translation.zh: 你知道我们不能去地面上的

translation.en: [Raphael] We've done this before.
translation.zh: 又不是没上去过

translation.en: We started something, we gotta finish it.
translation.zh: 不管做什么事 要有始有终

translation.en: [Michelangelo] This is insane.
translation.zh: 也太夸张了

translation.en: That cat is playing "Chopsticks" with chopsticks!
translation.zh: 那只猫在用筷子弹钢琴呢

translation.en: -[Leonardo] Don't be an idiot. -[monitor beeps]
translation.zh: 别犯傻了

translation.en: -[Michelangelo] Aw. -[Leonardo] Okay. Let's rock 'n' roll, boys!
translation.zh: 好了 开始行动 伙计们

translation.en: [woman] Run!
translation.zh: 快跑 凯伊 快

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Go, go!
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Just stay down!
translation.zh: 蹲下！

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Get over here!
translation.zh: 过来这里

translation.en: [Foot soldier 3] Keep moving!
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Move to the side.
translation.zh: 你给我过去 靠墙呆着

translation.en: -[male hostage] They're bombs. -[Foot soldier 1] Shut up! On the ground!
translation.zh: –是炸弹–闭嘴 趴在地上

translation.en: Nobody move!
translation.zh: 不准乱动

translation.en: We know you're out there!
translation.zh: 我们知道你们在这儿

translation.en: If you don't surrender, we start executing hostages!
translation.zh: 不出来投降 我们就要处决人质了

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Get your head down! Don't move!
translation.zh: 把头低下 别动

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Don't make me tell you again! Not a word!
translation.zh: 别让我再说一遍

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Don't look at me!
translation.zh: 不准出声 别看着我

translation.en: [woman whispering] Don't do it!
translation.zh: 不要这样

translation.en: [Karai] You! Stand up!
translation.zh: 你站起来

translation.en: [Raphael] All aboard!
translation.zh: 准备上车

translation.en: -[grunting] -[Karai] On your 12!
translation.zh: 在车顶上 快

translation.en: [Raphael] That's right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Like a shadow, brah.
translation.zh: 感觉很舒服吧

translation.en: [Leonardo] How you like that?
translation.zh: 让你再舒服点儿

translation.en: [Leonardo] Let's go! Let's move! Move!
translation.zh: 好了 快走

translation.en: -[woman] They went up that way! -[man 1] Did you see that?
translation.zh: -他们往那边去了-你确定

translation.en: [man 2] Here, here. They climbed up here!
translation.zh: -他们往那边去了-你确定 从这儿爬上去的

translation.en: -Right here. -[man 1] Some kind of freak! [man 2] There were a couple of them!
translation.zh: –好像是怪物–对 有好几个

translation.en: Whew! Right past me! [man 3] They saved us.
translation.zh: 就在我面前经过的 他们救了我们

translation.en: [SWAT officer] Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: Let's go, guys! Both sides!
translation.zh: 分头搜索 动作快点

translation.en: -[Raphael] Yeah, boys, bring it in. -[turtles cheering] [Donatello] That was amazing. You were incredible!
translation.zh: 太爽了 你简直太帅了

translation.en: [Leonardo] Great elbow, Donnie.
translation.zh: 你的肘击也不错

translation.en: [Raphael] Ooh, that's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 所以说 这是我们的城市

translation.en: This is our city! These are our streets!
translation.zh: 所以说 这是我们的城市 我们的街道

translation.en: [Michelangelo] You mess with us, you step into the Wu-whoo-Tang!
translation.zh: 我们的街道 让他们尝尝我们的厉害

translation.en: [Raphael] Oh, yeah! Did you see that guy's jaw connect with the concrete?
translation.zh: 你们看到那个摔个狗抢屎的家伙吗？

translation.en: [Donatello] He'll be drinking out of a sippy cup for months!
translation.zh: 他以后恐怕得用婴儿杯喝水了

translation.en: [Raphael] Ah, that's what I'm talking about, brothers.
translation.zh: 我想说的是 兄弟们

translation.en: Like shadows in the night. Completely unseen.
translation.zh: 我们是黑夜里的影子 来无影去无踪

translation.en: [Michelangelo whispering] What was that? [Donatello whispering] It's a camera flash.
translation.zh: –那是什么–相机的闪光灯

translation.en: [Leonardo] We know it's a camera flash.
translation.zh: –我们知道是闪光灯–问题是谁在拍照

translation.en: [Raphael] Who's behind the camera flash?
translation.zh: –我们知道是闪光灯–问题是谁在拍照 我推测是个女的 必须解决她

translation.en: [Donatello] By my calculations, it's a girl.
translation.zh: 我推测是个女的 必须解决她

translation.en: -[Michelangelo] Now we got to kill her... -[Donatello] What?
translation.zh: –什么–去哄她 送花 搞定她

translation.en: [Michelangelo] With kindness! Give her some flowers, earn her trust.
translation.zh: –什么–去哄她 送花 搞定她 –我去吧–拉斐尔 不 等等

translation.en: -[Raphael] I got this. -Raph, no, no, no! Come on!
translation.zh: –我去吧–拉斐尔 不 等等

translation.en: [Raphael] Give me the camera.
translation.zh: 把相机交出来

translation.en: [Donatello] Ooh, look, he's doing his Batman voice.
translation.zh: 看哪 他又学蝙蝠侠说话了

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Oh, she's so hot, I can feel my shell tightening.
translation.zh: 她好性感 我的壳都变紧了

translation.en: We can hear you!
translation.zh: 能小点儿声吗？

translation.en: [Raphael] If you don't give me the camera,
translation.zh: 如果不交出相机

translation.en: -I'm gonna... -[Leonardo] Enough!
translation.zh: 如果不交出相机 我就 够了

translation.en: Back off, Raph.
translation.zh: 让开 拉斐尔

translation.en: [Raphael] I only saw Batman once!
translation.zh: 我只看过一次《蝙蝠侠》

translation.en: [Leonardo] Ma'am, hello. I apologize.
translation.zh: 小姐 你好 真的很抱歉

translation.en: My colleague here forgot to say "please."
translation.zh: 我的伙伴刚才忘了跟你说请字

translation.en: So, would you please hand over the camera?
translation.zh: 所以 可以请你把相机交出来吗？

translation.en: -[April gasping] -No, no, no, no. Whoa.
translation.zh: 别怕 这是面具

translation.en: Whoa. Chill. It's just a mask. See? Don't freak out.
translation.zh: 别怕 这是面具 你看 别害怕 是吧

translation.en: [Donatello] Oh, I think that went well.
translation.zh: 这招还真不错

translation.en: Blood pressure stabilizing.
translation.zh: 呼吸平稳 血压正常

translation.en: Why are we still here playing doctor?
translation.zh: 干嘛要假装医生玩

translation.en: She may have a head injury.
translation.zh: 她可能撞到头了

translation.en: Uh, correction. She's a hot chick who may have a head injury,
translation.zh: 更正 这位漂亮美女可能撞到头了

translation.en: which makes it our civic duty to...
translation.zh: -所以我们有义务 醒醒-女士

translation.en: Can you hear me? Do you know what city you're in? Do you know where you are?
translation.zh: 能听见吗？ 知道你在哪儿吗？

translation.en: Have you seen that video where the cat plays "Chopsticks" with the chopsticks?
translation.zh: 你看过一只猫用筷子弹钢琴的视频吗？

translation.en: [Leonardo] Can we focus here?
translation.zh: 能不能专心点儿

translation.en: [Donatello] Guys, please! Come on. Give her some air.
translation.zh: 各位 拜托 让开点儿 让她透透气

translation.en: What are you?
translation.zh: 你们是谁

translation.en: Well, miss, uh, we're ninjas. We're mutants.
translation.zh: –小姐 我们是忍者–也是变种人

translation.en: Well, technically, we're turtles.
translation.zh: 确切地说是乌龟

translation.en: Oh, and we're teenagers.
translation.zh: 我们还是青少年

translation.en: But we can still have adult conversations.
translation.zh: 但是也可以聊聊成人话题

translation.en: [breathlessly] Wait, wait, wait. So... You're...
translation.zh: 好吧 那么 你们是

translation.en: ninja, mutant, turtle, teenagers?
translation.zh: 忍者 变种人 乌龟 青少年

translation.en: Well, when you put it like that, it sounds ridiculous!
translation.zh: 你这话怎么听起来这么别扭

translation.en: See, she's looking at us like we're freaks.
translation.zh: 看吧 她把我们都当成了怪物

translation.en: I bet that's why you took our picture, wasn't it?
translation.zh: 所以你才拍下我们的照片 对吧

translation.en: To show your friends?
translation.zh: -好跟朋友炫耀-这样挺好

translation.en: Bro, that's a good thing! Maybe she has hot friends.
translation.zh: -好跟朋友炫耀-这样挺好 她朋友也许是美女呢

translation.en: -Looking for this? -[April] Don't break it.
translation.zh: 你在找这个吗？ 不 别这样

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Please.
translation.zh: 不 别这样

translation.en: How many times do I have to tell you?
translation.zh: 你到底想让我跟你说几次

translation.en: We don't break things, we fix them.
translation.zh: 我们不搞破坏 而是修东西

translation.en: Donnie already wiped the phone, genius.
translation.zh: 多尼已经把照片删了 天才

translation.en: Problem solved, moving on.
translation.zh: 问题解决了 我们继续吧

translation.en: -And who put you in charge? -You know who did.
translation.zh: 别在这儿指手划脚的 你有意见 别吵了

translation.en: Ooh, tension! It's been, like, 30 whole minutes since you guys had this argument.
translation.zh: 你们两个已经吵半小时了

translation.en: Leonardo, if we want to make it home before Master, we gotta hustle.
translation.zh: 达芬奇 我们要赶在师父之前回家

translation.en: [whispering] Leonardo?
translation.zh: 达芬奇

translation.en: Do not say a word about this to anyone.
translation.zh: 跟任何人都要守口如瓶

translation.en: If you do, we will find you.
translation.zh: 否则 我们会找到你的

translation.en: April O'Neil.
translation.zh: 爱普尔·奥尼尔

translation.en: We're on the move, Raphael.
translation.zh: 我们该走了 拉斐尔

translation.en: Raphael?
translation.zh: 拉斐尔

translation.en: We'll find you, O'Neil.
translation.zh: 会找到你的 奥尼尔

translation.en: I'm sorry, that came across super creepy, okay? [chuckling]
translation.zh: 对不起 这话听起很可怕 是吧

translation.en: We will find you, though.
translation.zh: 会找到你的

translation.en: [Michelangelo] I was on fire, bro!
translation.zh: 我简直是激情澎湃

translation.en: Did you see me back there?
translation.zh: 我刚才帅不帅

translation.en: Guys, I totally talked to a girl!
translation.zh: 伙计们 我的女孩儿说话了

translation.en: [turtles] Shut up, Mikey!
translation.zh: 闭嘴了 麦奇

translation.en: Yeah, bro!
translation.zh: 快走吧 兄弟们

translation.en: -[turtles groaning] -Mikey, was that you? [Michelangelo chuckles] Pepperoni.
translation.zh: –麦奇 你放屁了–香肠味儿的

translation.en: [April] Leonardo. I know those names. I know those names.
translation.zh: 达芬奇 我记得这名字

translation.en: Raphael, Raphael. Leonardo.
translation.zh: 拉斐尔 达芬奇

translation.en: [young April on camera] Good evening. This is April O'Neil,
translation.zh: 晚上好 我是爱普尔·奥尼尔

translation.en: reporting live from my daddy's lab.
translation.zh: 在我爸爸的实验室现场直播

translation.en: I know it sounds pretty boring,
translation.zh: 我知道这听起来很无聊

translation.en: but actually, he does some pretty cool stuff.
translation.zh: 但我爸爸做的事可是很酷的

translation.en: Time to put the camera away, April.
translation.zh: 该把摄像机收起来了 爱普尔

translation.en: [young April] Aw, Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: And now, I will show you something amazing.
translation.zh: 你现在看到的是很厉害的东西

translation.en: It's supposed to be from a different planet
translation.zh: 它应该是来自外层空间的另一个星球

translation.en: -in outer space! -Here we go.
translation.zh: 它应该是来自外层空间的另一个星球 我们开始吧

translation.en: [young April] Mr. Sacks,
translation.zh: 萨克斯先生

translation.en: what sort of experiments are you doing here?
translation.zh: 请问你正在做的是什么实验

translation.en: That's a very complicated question.
translation.zh: 这是个非常复杂的问题

translation.en: We're trying to change the world.
translation.zh: 我们要改变这个世界

translation.en: [young April] Look at the camera! Hello, Splinter.
translation.zh: 看着镜头 你好 斯普林特

translation.en: [young April] And these are my little turtles, Leonardo, Raphael,
translation.zh: 这些是我的小乌龟 达芬奇 拉斐尔

translation.en: Michelangelo, and Donatello.
translation.zh: 米开朗基罗和多纳泰罗

translation.en: The fans want to see you!
translation.zh: 粉丝想看看你们

translation.en: [gasping] I knew it.
translation.zh: 我认识他

translation.en: The vigilante, I saw him. I saw them! I saw them.
translation.zh: 那个正义使者 我见过他们 我从小就认识 他们是我的宠物

translation.en: I've known them since I was a little girl.
translation.zh: 我从小就认识 他们是我的宠物

translation.en: They were my pets.
translation.zh: 是我小时候的宠物

translation.en: They were my childhood pets, and they were named after Italian Renaissance painters.
translation.zh: 名字都是意大利文艺复兴时期的画家

translation.en: Mom, I wanna move back home.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我想搬回家住

translation.en: [whispering] Is he here? I don't see him.
translation.zh: –他回来了吗？–我没看见 你呢？

translation.en: My thermal scans indicate there's a 74% variable
translation.zh: 我的热扫描告诉我 有74%的变量61%几率他不在

translation.en: that there's a 61% chance he's not--
translation.zh: 有74%的变量61%几率他不在

translation.en: That he's not here, guys. That he's not here.
translation.zh: 伙计们 他不在

translation.en: Okay. Fall in quietly.
translation.zh: 好吧 偷偷地溜进去

translation.en: [Raphael] Dude.
translation.zh: 你小声点儿

translation.en: So, guys, if it wasn't already obvious with that girl,
translation.zh: 兄弟们 我可先跟你们说清楚 那个美女是我的

translation.en: -dibs. -[both shushing]
translation.zh: 那个美女是我的

translation.en: If Master Splinter catches us, he'll send us back to the Ha'shi.
translation.zh: 如果被斯普林特师父抓住 他一定会处罚我们的

translation.en: I ain't going back to the Ha'shi.
translation.zh: 我可不想被处罚

translation.en: Every time we're in the Ha'shi, it's because of you.
translation.zh: 每次受罚还不都是因为你

translation.en: Well, bro, you won't have to worry about me dragging you down anymore.
translation.zh: 兄弟 你以后不用再担心我拖你下水了

translation.en: What's that supposed to mean?
translation.zh: 这话什么意思

translation.en: I'm going out on my own. First chance I get.
translation.zh: 一有机会我就会搬出去自己住

translation.en: How are we gonna finish our hip-hop Christmas album, bro?
translation.zh: 那我们的嘻哈圣诞专辑怎么办？

translation.en: -You're the hype man! -[shushing]
translation.zh: 还指望你呢 住嘴

translation.en: -Shut up. -[all shushing] Shut up.
translation.zh: 住嘴

translation.en: You spit in my eye.
translation.zh: 我的眼睛

translation.en: Shh! He's not going anywhere. We all stick together.
translation.zh: 你就放心吧 他哪儿都不会去的 我们永远不会分开

translation.en: Sorry I spit in your eye, bro.
translation.zh: 对不起 喷到你眼睛了

translation.en: -Shut up. -[Donatello] Guys? Guys.
translation.zh: 伙计们

translation.en: We got a bogey.
translation.zh: 不明物体入侵

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Uh...
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -[grunting] -[Splinter] Where have you been? We weren't... [straining]
translation.zh: -你们跑到哪儿去了-我们哪儿也

translation.en: I forgot to soak my retainer.
translation.zh: 我忘泡牙齿矫正器了

translation.en: I'm totally sleepwalking!
translation.zh: 我这是在梦游

translation.en: Look, Mikey's sleeping and walking.
translation.zh: 看 麦奇一边睡觉 一边走路

translation.en: He's totally innocent. [groans]
translation.zh: 他是清白无辜的 不

translation.en: Enough! You disobeyed a direct order.
translation.zh: 够了 你们违背了我的命令

translation.en: Why did you go above ground? What happened?
translation.zh: 为什么到地面上去 为什么

translation.en: -[Splinter] Very well. -[whimpering] If that's how it's going to be,
translation.zh: 很好 如果你们一定要这样

translation.en: -to the Ha'shi! -[turtles groaning]
translation.zh: 那就受罚吧

translation.en: O'Neil! All right, what was so important I had to get here?
translation.zh: 奥尼尔 叫我来有什么大事吗？

translation.en: -Okay. Are you ready? -Yeah.
translation.zh: –是的 准备好了吗？–好了

translation.en: -I saw the vigilante? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好吧 我看见了正义使者-对

translation.en: But I had no photos or evidence to show you, so I just sounded crazy.
translation.zh: 但我拿不出任何照片或证据 -所以听起来很荒唐-没错

translation.en: -Yes. -Okay. But I saw him again. Well, I didn't see him again,
translation.zh: 但我又看到他了 不对

translation.en: I saw them, because there's four.
translation.zh: 应该说是他们 因为是四个

translation.en: There's not just one, there's four.
translation.zh: 不是一个是四个

translation.en: And I was standing as close to them as you are to me right now.
translation.zh: 当时我离他们就像跟你这么近

translation.en: What'd they look like? I'll show you.
translation.zh: -他们长什么样-你来看

translation.en: Like this. Like turtles?
translation.zh: 什么 就这样 像乌龟

translation.en: Well, they don't look like turtles because they are turtles.
translation.zh: 他们不是像乌龟 他们就是乌龟

translation.en: They're over six feet tall and they speak English.
translation.zh: 身高超过183厘米 而且还讲英文

translation.en: -[sighing] -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天哪

translation.en: I was awake all night, please look, I was awake all night
translation.zh: 我整晚都没睡 求你看一下 我整晚都在搜寻

translation.en: googling all of the thwarted crimes
translation.zh: 过去三个月没有得逞的犯罪

translation.en: over the past three months, and this symbol
translation.zh: 过去三个月没有得逞的犯罪 这个记号出现在每一个犯罪现场

translation.en: appeared at every single one.
translation.zh: 这个记号出现在每一个犯罪现场

translation.en: Look. Every single one of them.
translation.zh: 看 每一个都有

translation.en: This one, look. Here, here, here, here, here.
translation.zh: 这个 看 这儿

translation.en: And it's an ancient Japanese symbol that means "family."
translation.zh: 这两个字在日文里是家的意思

translation.en: -Oh, my God... -Wait, it's on my laptop.
translation.zh: 等等 我的笔记本哪儿去了

translation.en: I can't believe you brought me in to do this!
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你叫我来就是说这些

translation.en: Here. It's... It's here, it's here.
translation.zh: 这儿 在这儿呢

translation.en: -[sighs] -This is my father's lab.
translation.zh: 我父亲的实验室

translation.en: This is the same lab where these things were born,
translation.zh: 这些东西就是在这里诞生的

translation.en: or... or... or created, or mutated, or...
translation.zh: 被创造和变种的

translation.en: I don't know the terminology,
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么说

translation.en: but will you please just look at what
translation.zh: 你能不能看看这些东西

translation.en: I'm showing you and listen to me? It's all connected.
translation.zh: 你能不能看看这些东西 听我跟你说说他们之间的关系

translation.en: The turtles are the vigilantes, and the vigilantes are these turtles.
translation.zh: 正义使者就是这些乌龟

translation.en: [young April on video] Pizza has cheese,
translation.zh: 这比萨有加奶酪和西红柿酱

translation.en: tomato sauce, all your favorite stuff.
translation.zh: 这比萨有加奶酪和西红柿酱 都是你们喜欢的 吃吧

translation.en: Eat it. You guys need nutrition. Or not.
translation.zh: 你们需要营养 随便了

translation.en: I just want to be clear.
translation.zh: 我想先弄清楚

translation.en: You are now telling me that there are
translation.zh: 你的意思是说 有四只六尺高且会说话的乌龟

translation.en: four six-foot talking turtles walking around New York City,
translation.zh: 有四只六尺高且会说话的乌龟 在纽约市走来走去

translation.en: and no one has seen them but you?
translation.zh: 只有你能看到他们

translation.en: That's what I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 我就是这个意思

translation.en: [chuckling] I don't mean to laugh,
translation.zh: 我不是想笑你

translation.en: but is there anything else we should know about them?
translation.zh: 不过 还有其它关于他们的资料吗？

translation.en: They're ninjas. I'm sorry, what?
translation.zh: –他们是忍者–对不起 什么

translation.en: And they do karate. Okay, get out.
translation.zh: –他们会空手道–好了 滚出去

translation.en: [Vern] O'Neil!
translation.zh: 奥尼尔

translation.en: It could have been worse.
translation.zh: 还没那么糟

translation.en: I just got fired, Vern. How could it be worse?
translation.zh: 六频道新闻 –我被解雇了 弗恩 还能更糟吗？–也许是好事

translation.en: Maybe it's good. Maybe you should take a little time, take care of yourself.
translation.zh: 你应该花点时间好好照顾自己

translation.en: Come on, let me give you a ride.
translation.zh: 我来送你吧

translation.en: Not unless you're going to the Eric Sacks' estate.
translation.zh: 除非你送我去埃里克·萨克斯家

translation.en: -April... Hey. -I'm not giving up on this story.
translation.zh: -我不会放弃这个新闻的-爱普尔…嘿！

translation.en: You gotta put that to bed.
translation.zh: 别再想这事了

translation.en: Would all of those other great reporters that you worked with, would they have "put it to bed"?
translation.zh: 难道和你共事过的那些杰出的记者也会放弃吗？

translation.en: No. That's different.
translation.zh: 他们不一样

translation.en: How is it different?
translation.zh: 他们有什么不一样

translation.en: They all started exactly where I am, right?
translation.zh: 他们最初也和我一样 不是吗？

translation.en: I'm not driving the Channel 6 news van onto the Sacks estate.
translation.zh: 不能开六频道的车去萨克斯家

translation.en: -Who asked you to do that? -Uh, you did.
translation.zh: –谁要你这么做的–你啊

translation.en: And a "thanks" would have been nice.
translation.zh: 连谢谢也不说一声

translation.en: Maybe one day you're gonna be thanking me.
translation.zh: 说不定有一天你要反过来谢我呢

translation.en: So, what do you want with Eric Sacks?
translation.zh: 你去找萨克斯干什么

translation.en: My dad used to work for him.
translation.zh: 我爸爸曾是他的员工

translation.en: He's the only person that's gonna be able
translation.zh: 他是唯一能告诉我

translation.en: to tell me whether or not I'm crazy.
translation.zh: 我是不是疯了的人

translation.en: Crazy about what?
translation.zh: 疯什么？

translation.en: I don't need you to laugh at me, also.
translation.zh: 我不想你也笑我

translation.en: Oh, come on, O'Neil. This is the Fenwick Express.
translation.zh: 行了 奥尼尔 这是弗恩直达快车

translation.en: It's a judgment-free zone, a cocoon of safety.
translation.zh: 这儿是心灵的避风港是移动的安全屋

translation.en: Promise? I'm insulted that you would suggest otherwise.
translation.zh: –你保证？–你要不相信就是在侮辱我

translation.en: Ooh, 11 hours in the Ha'shi.
translation.zh: 现在已经过11个小时了

translation.en: Are you sure none of you want to tell me
translation.zh: 还是没有人要告诉我

translation.en: where you were last night?
translation.zh: 昨晚你们去哪儿了

translation.en: How you holding up, fellas?
translation.zh: 大家还能撑得住吗？

translation.en: Ah! I ain't breaking if Donnie ain't breaking.
translation.zh: 多尼能行我就能行

translation.en: Experiencing intense nausea but not breaking.
translation.zh: 我好想吐 但还能撑住

translation.en: Guys? I'm in the zone!
translation.zh: 各位 我已经入定了

translation.en: There is literally nothing that could break me right now!
translation.zh: 现在没有任何东西可以影响到我

translation.en: Starting to break.
translation.zh: 快忍不住了

translation.en: Of course, you've all tasted the five-cheese pizza.
translation.zh: 你们都吃过放了五种奶酪的比萨

translation.en: But this,
translation.zh: 但这种比萨 奶酪专家们一致认为

translation.en: cheese-mongers have speculated of its existence for centuries.
translation.zh: 但这种比萨 奶酪专家们一致认为 它已经有好几百年的历史了

translation.en: Da Vinci's original masterpiece.
translation.zh: 而且是达芬奇的原创大作

translation.en: I submit to you...
translation.zh: 我为你们呈上

translation.en: ...the 99-cheese pizza.
translation.zh: 99种奶酪的比萨

translation.en: It's not possible.
translation.zh: 这绝对是不可能的

translation.en: Mikey, it's a trap!
translation.zh: 麦奇 这是圈套

translation.en: A pizza with that variety of cheese is a culinary impossibility!
translation.zh: 放那么多种奶酪的比萨我从没听说过

translation.en: -Shall I list the ingredients? -No.
translation.zh: –要不要我说说都有哪几种–不

translation.en: -Cheddar. -[straining] -Provolone. -Mikey, don't you do it!
translation.zh: –切达 波萝伏洛–麦奇 千万顶住

translation.en: -[Splinter] Asiago. -[Donatello] Keep it together! Taleggio.
translation.zh: –艾斯阿格 塔雷吉欧–坚定意志

translation.en: [softly] I don't even know what that is.
translation.zh: 不知道你在说什么

translation.en: Mozzarella, of course.
translation.zh: 当然还有莫萨里拉奶酪

translation.en: All right, all right, all right! We left the lair
translation.zh: 好了 我说 我们离开是因为大脚帮挟持了人质

translation.en: because the Foot were taking hostages
translation.zh: 我们离开是因为大脚帮挟持了人质

translation.en: and we kicked some serious butt,
translation.zh: 我们去教训他们 然后有个叫爱普尔·奥尼尔的女生

translation.en: and there was this girl named April O'Neil who took our picture,
translation.zh: 然后有个叫爱普尔·奥尼尔的女生 拍下了我们的照片 但已经搞定了

translation.en: [gasping] but we took care of it.
translation.zh: 拍下了我们的照片 但已经搞定了

translation.en: [Raphael] Idiot.
translation.zh: 真白痴

translation.en: Oh, no, my worst fears have been realized.
translation.zh: 不 我最担心的终于发生了

translation.en: Don't worry about it. Donnie erased the picture. We're not in danger.
translation.zh: 不用担心 照片已经删了 不会有危险的

translation.en: No. It's April O'Neil who is in danger!
translation.zh: 不 是爱普尔·奥尼尔有危险了

translation.en: Find the girl. Bring her here.
translation.zh: 去找到她 然后带到这儿来

translation.en: But, sensei, you said to not go... Find the girl!
translation.zh: -可你说不准我们-去找她

translation.en: Find the girl.
translation.zh: 去找她

translation.en: [April] That's what I told Thompson, and she fired me.
translation.zh: 汤普森听了之后就把我解雇了

translation.en: So they're aliens?
translation.zh: 他们是外星人

translation.en: No, that's stupid. They're reptiles.
translation.zh: 不 那怎么可能 他们是爬行动物

translation.en: They help people, I guess.
translation.zh: 我猜是帮助人类的

translation.en: Heroes in the half-shell.
translation.zh: 背着龟壳的英雄

translation.en: -Okay. -Come on. It's not that crazy.
translation.zh: –好吧–其实 这并不疯狂

translation.en: I... The animal kingdom is full of...
translation.zh: 动物王国总是充满

translation.en: I used to have a dog that could moonwalk.
translation.zh: 我还有只狗还会跳霹雳舞呢

translation.en: Thanks for the ride, Vern. Yeah. No problem.
translation.zh: –谢谢你送我 弗恩–不客气

translation.en: -[car door closes] -Nothing better than dropping off a pretty girl at a rich guy's house.
translation.zh: 没什么比送美女去富人家感觉更爽了

translation.en: Hi, it's April O'Neil, here to see Eric Sacks.
translation.zh: 爱普尔·奥尼尔想见埃里克·萨克斯

translation.en: April's arrived early this year.
translation.zh: 你来的比春天还早

translation.en: I'm sorry to barge in on you like this, Mr. Sacks.
translation.zh: 我知道这样很冒昧 萨克斯先生

translation.en: No, no, no. Please, please.
translation.zh: –不 请进–谢谢

translation.en: I've been working on a story.
translation.zh: 我在关注一个新闻

translation.en: And I have this theory that there are these vigilantes
translation.zh: 我有个猜想 这些反击大脚帮的正义使者

translation.en: that are fighting back against the Foot.
translation.zh: 这些反击大脚帮的正义使者

translation.en: I think that you and my father may have created them.
translation.zh: 可能是你和我父亲创造出来的

translation.en: Uh, I'm not sure I...
translation.zh: -我不太明白-你能不能告诉我

translation.en: Can you please tell me everything that you know about Project Renaissance?
translation.zh: -我不太明白-你能不能告诉我 文艺复兴计划的所有细节

translation.en: Well, um, it was a dream.
translation.zh: 那就像一场梦

translation.en: A dream that died with your father.
translation.zh: 和你父亲一起死去了

translation.en: What if it isn't dead? That's impossible.
translation.zh: –如果还没死呢？–那不可能

translation.en: We lost all our research in the fire, all our specimens, everything.
translation.zh: 那场大火让我们失去了所有研究成果

translation.en: I've spent the last 15 years trying to replicate the results.
translation.zh: 十五年来我一直在尝试恢复那些成果

translation.en: You didn't lose everything in the fire.
translation.zh: 那场大火没有毁掉一切

translation.en: This can't be real.
translation.zh: 这不可能是真的

translation.en: It is real. I saw all four of them.
translation.zh: 就是真的 我见到了他们四个

translation.en: Do you really want to know about Project Renaissance?
translation.zh: 你真的想了解文艺复兴计划

translation.en: -Yes. -Come with me.
translation.zh: –是的–跟我来

translation.en: [Vern] I was born in Japan, at a military base in Okinawa.
translation.zh: 我出生在日本冲绳的军事基地

translation.en: My father went to Vietnam. Didn't come back.
translation.zh: 我父亲参加了越战 再也没回来

translation.en: I was an outsider in a foreign land. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 在别人眼里我是个异类

translation.en: A freak. I was a powerless and helpless boy,
translation.zh: 是个怪物 无依无靠 任人欺凌

translation.en: until a local sensei took me under his wing,
translation.zh: 直到当地一个师父好心收留了我

translation.en: and he saved me.
translation.zh: 我才活了下来

translation.en: Taught me lessons that I later shared with your father.
translation.zh: 他教我的东西我后来也教给了你父亲

translation.en: 9th century Japan.
translation.zh: 九世纪的日本

translation.en: An evil warlord ruled the land.
translation.zh: 被一个邪恶的军阀统治

translation.en: He poisoned the water supply, bringing on the dark ages.
translation.zh: 他在水中下毒 带来了黑暗时代

translation.en: Death, and disease, and suffering ran rampant.
translation.zh: 死亡 疾病和痛苦四处蔓延

translation.en: Not unlike the Foot Clan and what they'd like to do to our city.
translation.zh: 和现在的大脚帮在这里做的事一样

translation.en: Then one day, a hero arose.
translation.zh: 但有一天 出了一个英雄

translation.en: A great alchemist discovered the antidote
translation.zh: 一位伟大的炼金术师发明了解药

translation.en: to the warlord's poison. The cure-all for his evil.
translation.zh: 对这种毒很有效这解药 就是万灵丹

translation.en: Your father and I were trying to recreate that cure-all.
translation.zh: 你父亲和我就是想做出这个万灵丹

translation.en: We developed a mutagen
translation.zh: 我们研发出一种突变原

translation.en: capable of stimulating self-repair
translation.zh: 让细胞可以进行自我修复

translation.en: on a cellular level.
translation.zh: 效果很完美

translation.en: What were you going to do with it?
translation.zh: 你想用它做什么

translation.en: Imagine New York City...
translation.zh: 你可以想象一下

translation.en: being victim to a chemical attack.
translation.zh: 如果纽约遭到化学攻击

translation.en: This mutagen would be able to reverse its effects.
translation.zh: 那么这种突变原就能扭转劣势

translation.en: It would save the city, it would save the people.
translation.zh: 拯救城市和民众的生命

translation.en: Those test subjects, those turtles,
translation.zh: 那几只乌龟就是试验品

translation.en: running in their blood
translation.zh: 他们体内的血液

translation.en: is the last of this precious mutagen.
translation.zh: 是现在仅存的珍贵突变原

translation.en: And up until a few moments ago,
translation.zh: 如果不是你告诉我的话

translation.en: I thought we failed. I thought they died in the fire. How...
translation.zh: 我已经绝望了 我以为他们被烧死了

translation.en: How could they have lived? Because I saved them.
translation.zh: –他们怎么活下来的–是我救了他们

translation.en: Of course you did.
translation.zh: 我就知道

translation.en: April, the mutagen possesses powers
translation.zh: 爱普尔 这些突变原拥有的力量

translation.en: beyond our wildest hopes.
translation.zh: 超乎我们想象的强大

translation.en: Whatever resources you need, I'm here.
translation.zh: 无论你需要什么帮助 跟我说

translation.en: Let's work together. We'll find them.
translation.zh: 我们一起把他们找出来

translation.en: The course of human history may depend on it.
translation.zh: 萨克斯 萨克斯集团 人类历史将因此而改变

translation.en: I'll show you out.
translation.zh: 我送你出去

translation.en: [Donatello] Bam! You've been hacked! By Donatello. Remember me?
translation.zh: 你被黑了 是多纳泰罗还记得我吗？

translation.en: Turtle. Four eyes. But enough about me.
translation.zh: 乌龟 带眼镜的 最帅的那个

translation.en: We told you we'd find you. Meet us here.
translation.zh: 我们说过会找到你的 来这里 你一个人 否则的话

translation.en: And come alone. Or... Or else, we're...
translation.zh: 第四大道与十二街交会处 单独来

translation.en: You shall be punished... and stuff.
translation.zh: 你会受到处罚什么的

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: You told me to come here.
translation.zh: 是你们让我来这里

translation.en: I didn't bring anyone with me.
translation.zh: 我没带其他人来

translation.en: I did exactly-- [gasps]
translation.zh: 按你们说的 很好

translation.en: Okay! Are you April O'Neil?
translation.zh: 你是爱普尔·奥尼尔

translation.en: Initiating retinal scan. Scanning, scanning, scanning, scanning.
translation.zh: 进行视网膜扫描 扫描完毕

translation.en: Scan complete. It's her. It's her. Guys, it's her!
translation.zh: 分析中 爱普尔·奥尼尔

translation.en: Of course it's her, Donnie.
translation.zh: –是她 没错 兄弟们–当然是她 多尼

translation.en: Hey! Really glad you could make it.
translation.zh: –是她 没错 兄弟们–当然是她 多尼 很高兴你能来

translation.en: Hey. There's someone important
translation.zh: 我们要给你介绍一个重要的人认识

translation.en: we want to introduce you to, but first...
translation.zh: 我们要给你介绍一个重要的人认识 但是首先

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Aw, yeah, welcome to my crib, girl.
translation.zh: 太好了 欢迎来到我家 美女

translation.en: [April panting] Where are we?
translation.zh: 这是哪里

translation.en: [Donatello] Hey, it's our Fortress of Solitude.
translation.zh: –是我们的孤独堡垒–魔法学院

translation.en: -[Michelangelo] Our Hogwarts. -[Donatello] Our Xavier Academy.
translation.zh: 我们的X学院

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Our next generation, state-of-the-art WonderDome!
translation.zh: 这是我们最新一代的飘浮基地

translation.en: [April sniffs] Ugh. Are we in the sewer?
translation.zh: 这里是下水道吗？

translation.en: [Michelangelo] No.
translation.zh: 不 严格地说

translation.en: -[Donatello] Technically, yes. -[Michelangelo] Yeah. Yeah, it's a sewer.
translation.zh: 是的 这儿是下水道

translation.en: [Splinter] You brought us here, April.
translation.zh: 是你把我们带到这儿的

translation.en: Splinter? [Donatello] How does she know his name?
translation.zh: –斯普林特–她怎么知道

translation.en: Did you tell her his name?
translation.zh: 难道不是你告诉她的

translation.en: -[Donatello] Maybe she's clairvoyant. -Maybe she's a Jedi!
translation.zh: 她会透视 也许是绝地武士

translation.en: Come closer.
translation.zh: 走过来点儿

translation.en: It's been a long time.
translation.zh: 我们好久不见了

translation.en: You always did have your father's eyes.
translation.zh: 你的眼睛还是像你父亲

translation.en: I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我实在是不明白

translation.en: Don't be afraid. All will be made clear.
translation.zh: 不用害怕 我来说给你听

translation.en: This is crazy.
translation.zh: 这太疯狂了

translation.en: Why are you here? Student.
translation.zh: 来找我什么事 我的学生

translation.en: [in English] There's been a miracle.
translation.zh: 发生了一个奇迹

translation.en: The vigilantes who've been causing us so much trouble?
translation.zh: 还记得那些总找麻烦的正义使者吗？

translation.en: They're the test subjects.
translation.zh: 他们是我的实验品

translation.en: Those itty-bitty box turtles
translation.zh: 就是那些我们以为

translation.en: that we thought we lost in the fire?
translation.zh: 被大火烧死的小乌龟

translation.en: They're alive, Master Shredder.
translation.zh: 他们还活着 史莱德大师

translation.en: And they've grown into something powerful.
translation.zh: 他们现在变得很厉害

translation.en: It won't be easy to capture them, but if we can,
translation.zh: 想抓住他们不容易 但如果抓住

translation.en: we can finally carry out the plan that we had all those years ago.
translation.zh: 我们就能最终完成我们多年前的计划

translation.en: My Foot Clan will have unlimited power. And you will have your money.
translation.zh: 我的大脚帮就会有无限的力量你也会得到想要的钱

translation.en: [in English] The city will be ours.
translation.zh: 还有这个城市

translation.en: Find them.
translation.zh: 找到他们

translation.en: [in English] O'Neil's daughter was the one who found them,
translation.zh: 奥尼尔的女儿找到了他们

translation.en: and she will be the one who will take us right to them.
translation.zh: 她会带我们找到他们的

translation.en: [Foot tech] There's the ping. We've breached the cloaking security.
translation.zh: 连接成功 已经破解了他们的防火墙

translation.en: [Splinter] Listen closely, April.
translation.zh: 仔细听我说 爱普尔

translation.en: I don't remember a time before living in that laboratory.
translation.zh: 来实验室以前的事情我全都不记得了

translation.en: That fateful night started like any other.
translation.zh: 事发当晚 和平常没什么两样

translation.en: Sacks gave us our injections.
translation.zh: 萨克斯给我们进行注射

translation.en: Your father made sure our vital signs were strong.
translation.zh: 你父亲确认我们的生命迹象稳定

translation.en: And you, as always, provided us with a special treat.
translation.zh: 而你 像往常一样 给我们喂好吃的

translation.en: After the brothers went to sleep,
translation.zh: 乌龟兄弟们睡着之后

translation.en: I heard loud voices.
translation.zh: 我听到很大的吵架声

translation.en: There was the smell of smoke.
translation.zh: 接着大火开始着起来

translation.en: Alarms sounded.
translation.zh: 警报声也响了起来

translation.en: Your father had discovered the truth behind the man he was working for.
translation.zh: 你父亲发现真相和他老板的真实面目

translation.en: He set fire to the lab.
translation.zh: 放火烧了实验室

translation.en: His last breath was taken
translation.zh: 为了毁灭史莱德的计划

translation.en: trying to destroy Shredder's plan.
translation.zh: 你父亲也失去了他的生命

translation.en: I was terrified. But then, you appeared...
translation.zh: 我当时被吓坏了 但这时候你出现了

translation.en: And ushered us to safety.
translation.zh: 把我们送到安全的地方

translation.en: I never had a voice then,
translation.zh: 可惜我当时不会说话

translation.en: but I thank you now, April.
translation.zh: 但我现在要谢谢你 爱普尔

translation.en: We wandered the sewers until I found this place.
translation.zh: 后来我们在下水道发现了这个地方

translation.en: It was then that the mutagen that was injected into our blood
translation.zh: 然后我们体内的突变原

translation.en: began to change us in miraculous ways.
translation.zh: 让我们产生了很多不可思议的变化

translation.en: I saw how your father loved you,
translation.zh: 我看到你父亲是如何疼爱你

translation.en: and I knew I had to show that same love to the turtles.
translation.zh: 所以我也要用同样的爱心 对待这些小家伙们

translation.en: I became their father,
translation.zh: 我变成了他们的父亲

translation.en: and they became my sons.
translation.zh: 他们就是我的儿子

translation.en: Like all children, they were drawn
translation.zh: 和别的孩子一样 他们也会受到流行文化的吸引

translation.en: to the distractions of popular culture.
translation.zh: 他们也会受到流行文化的吸引

translation.en: And I knew one day
translation.zh: 我知道有一天

translation.en: they would want to explore the world above.
translation.zh: 他们会想要探索地面上的世界

translation.en: [Splinter] They would be ridiculed.
translation.zh: 他们会被人嘲弄

translation.en: They would need to learn to protect themselves,
translation.zh: 他们必须学会如何保护自己

translation.en: both mentally and physically.
translation.zh: 无论是心理上 还是身体上

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Hey, does anyone want to play Buck-Buck?
translation.zh: 我们来玩人体跳箱

translation.en: Buck one! Buck two!
translation.zh: 一号 二号 三号

translation.en: Where you going, Raph?
translation.zh: 你要去哪儿 拉斐尔

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Come on. I can't do it by myself. I need all four!
translation.zh: 别这样 我自己没法玩 得四个人

translation.en: [Donatello] You're a Buck short.
translation.zh: 两个人就行

translation.en: [Raphael] Yeah, that sounds stupid. Like you, Mikey!
translation.zh: 听起来可真蠢 跟你一样 麦奇

translation.en: [Michelangelo] That's why you're just the hype man, brah. -See these moves? -[Raphael] Yeah, whatever, man.
translation.zh: –你是不能少的 兄弟 看到我的没–算了吧 麦奇

translation.en: [Splinter] And then I found a way.
translation.zh: 于是我找到了方法

translation.en: First, I would teach myself the ancient art of Ninjutsu.
translation.zh: 我先让自己学会这种古老的忍术

translation.en: The brothers followed my lead,
translation.zh: 四兄弟在我的教导下

translation.en: accelerating at a wondrous rate!
translation.zh: 以惊人的速度迅速成长起来

translation.en: Wassup, brah? Want some of this?
translation.zh: 怎么样兄弟 想来试试吗？

translation.en: I'm like a ghost!
translation.zh: 我像幽灵一样

translation.en: I'm over here, now I'm over here, brah. Like a shadow!
translation.zh: 一会儿在这儿 一会儿在那儿 我就是影子 我是一只影子喷火龙

translation.en: I'm a flame shadow fire dragon!
translation.zh: 我就是影子 我是一只影子喷火龙

translation.en: [Splinter] Their gift was also their passion.
translation.zh: 他们对此也有很大的热情

translation.en: They lived, breathed, and dreamed all things martial arts.
translation.zh: 时时刻刻 甚至连作梦都是武术

translation.en: Then, they were ready.
translation.zh: 终于 是时候了

translation.en: The Katana, most noble of all the blades.
translation.zh: 武士刀是所有刀里最高贵的

translation.en: It is the weapon of a leader.
translation.zh: 只有领袖才会拥有

translation.en: Everything they are,
translation.zh: 他们能有今天

translation.en: and everything that they've become
translation.zh: 他们之所以能拥有这一切

translation.en: was made possible by the bravery
translation.zh: 是因为你在决定命运的那一晚

translation.en: that you displayed on that fateful night.
translation.zh: 展现出的无比的勇气

translation.en: Dude.
translation.zh: 兄弟

translation.en: I was just a little girl.
translation.zh: 我当时只是个小女孩

translation.en: And you gave us freedom,
translation.zh: 但是你给了我们自由

translation.en: where others would have kept us in cages.
translation.zh: 别人只会把我们关在笼子里

translation.en: [Leonardo] Wait a minute, Dad.
translation.zh: 等一下 爸爸

translation.en: All these years, you told us we were rescued from the fire
translation.zh: 这些年你一直对我们说 在大火中把我们救出来的

translation.en: by a great guardian spirit, the Hogo-sha.
translation.zh: 是一名伟大的守护者

translation.en: That's right. And this is the Hogo-sha.
translation.zh: 对 没错 她就是那个守护者

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么

translation.en: [Michelangelo whispering] My girlfriend's totally the Hogo-sha.
translation.zh: 我女朋友居然是守护者

translation.en: Fortunately, our engineers have been making great progress
translation.zh: 幸运的是 我们的工程师改进了

translation.en: in refining the robotics in your armor.
translation.zh: 你盔甲上的很多机动技术

translation.en: We're taking it to the next level,
translation.zh: 把它提升到另一个层次

translation.en: bridging the gap between ancient tradition and modern warfare.
translation.zh: 把古代传统和现代武器结合起来

translation.en: Tonight, I dine on turtle soup.
translation.zh: 今晚我要喝乌龟汤

translation.en: Why did you bring me here?
translation.zh: 为什么让我来这儿

translation.en: To find out who you told of our existence.
translation.zh: 想知道你跟谁说过我们的事

translation.en: Nobody that believed me, except for Eric Sacks.
translation.zh: 没有人愿意相信我 除了埃里克·萨克斯

translation.en: Sacks. Just as I feared.
translation.zh: 萨克斯 我担心的就是他

translation.en: Sacks is not a friend.
translation.zh: 萨克斯不是我们的朋友

translation.en: His soul has been poisoned by the influence of a dark master...
translation.zh: 他的灵魂已经被邪恶的魔鬼污染了

translation.en: The Shredder.
translation.zh: 那个史莱德

translation.en: Shredder practically raised Sacks in Japan.
translation.zh: 史莱德在日本把萨克斯从小养大

translation.en: He's like a father to him.
translation.zh: 就像萨克斯的父亲一样

translation.en: Sacks will do anything for his master.
translation.zh: 萨克斯为了他什么都愿意做 等等

translation.en: Sacks and Shredder?
translation.zh: 萨克斯和史莱德

translation.en: So, why aren't we out there hunting them down?
translation.zh: 为什么不直接杀了他们

translation.en: Because, Raphael,
translation.zh: 冷静点儿 拉斐尔

translation.en: the Shredder is a skilled warrior
translation.zh: 因为史莱德是个格斗高手

translation.en: whose cruelty is ever-reaching!
translation.zh: 而且无比残忍毒辣

translation.en: And you are just teenagers.
translation.zh: 而你们还是没长大的孩子

translation.en: The mutagen in your blood is of great value to them.
translation.zh: 你们血液里的突变原 对他们有很大的价值

translation.en: Now that Sacks has confirmation that you are alive,
translation.zh: 现在萨克斯知道了你们还活着

translation.en: I fear they will bring the fight to us.
translation.zh: 我担心他们随时会对我们开战

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Stand by to make entry. Let's move! Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 准备冲进去 行动 快

translation.en: [Donatello] Perimeter infringe... Breach! We have incoming!
translation.zh: 外围遭到入侵 有人来了 惨了

translation.en: Oh, no! Oh, no! We got two breaches. Fan room, weapons wall!
translation.zh: 不 两处被入侵 风机房和武器库

translation.en: [Leonardo] Mikey, flank right! Donnie, on me!
translation.zh: 麦奇 负责右边 多尼 跟我来

translation.en: We gotta go! Go, go!
translation.zh: 动作快点儿 快

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Stand by to set charge.
translation.zh: 炸药安装完成

translation.en: Lock and load. We're going on 10.
translation.zh: 准备爆破 倒数十秒

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] No live ammo. Tranqs only. [Foot soldier] Take 'em alive!
translation.zh: 别用致命武力 用麻醉剂 抓活的

translation.en: No! Get back!
translation.zh: 不 快退后

translation.en: [Leonardo] Donnie!
translation.zh: 多尼

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Engage!
translation.zh: 当心

translation.en: Get him!
translation.zh: 抓住他

translation.en: There they are! Neutralize them!
translation.zh: 他们在那儿 制服他们

translation.en: [Donatello] They've got tranq darts!
translation.zh: 他们有麻醉枪

translation.en: Well, don't let them hit your skin.
translation.zh: 别让身体被射中 我们走 行动

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Over there!
translation.zh: 那里！

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Tango at 12!
translation.zh: 那边 抓住那些乌龟

translation.en: Wassup, brah? Oh, you think you can handle this, huh?
translation.zh: 我说老兄 你们以为打得过我吗？

translation.en: I'm a snapping turtle, fool. Snap, snap, snap!
translation.zh: 我可是会咬人的乌龟 咬咬

translation.en: I meant to do that! I meant to do it!
translation.zh: 我是说踹 你听错了

translation.en: We got a breach in the fan room!
translation.zh: –风机房被入侵了–哪儿

translation.en: Raph, get to the fan room!
translation.zh: 快去风机房

translation.en: Why are you always telling me what to do?
translation.zh: 你别总对我指手划脚的 快点儿去

translation.en: Just go! Mikey, you gotta get April out of here, now!
translation.zh: 你别总对我指手划脚的 快点儿去 麦奇 带爱普尔离开这儿 快

translation.en: [Michelangelo] I got this!
translation.zh: 交给我吧

translation.en: April, come with me. I got a safe place for you to hide.
translation.zh: 爱普尔 跟我来 我带你先躲起来

translation.en: And if you get thirsty,
translation.zh: 要是你口渴

translation.en: I got a secret stash of Orange Crush behind the fridge.
translation.zh: 我在冰箱后面偷偷藏着橘子汁

translation.en: Don't tell Raph.
translation.zh: 别告诉拉斐尔

translation.en: Shredder.
translation.zh: 史莱德

translation.en: [Shredder] All these years, I've been trying to recreate the mutagen.
translation.zh: 这么多年来我一直想重新研发突变原

translation.en: And you? You just handed it to me.
translation.zh: 没想到 你竟然能双手奉上

translation.en: You will not lay a hand on my sons.
translation.zh: 你别想打我儿子们的主意

translation.en: [Shredder] Your sons?
translation.zh: 你的儿子

translation.en: You think you're their father?
translation.zh: 你以为你是他们的父亲

translation.en: Very good, rat.
translation.zh: 真不错 老鼠

translation.en: Sensei!
translation.zh: 师父

translation.en: Donnie!
translation.zh: 多尼

translation.en: [Donatello] Hang on, Leo! Be right there!
translation.zh: 坚持住 达芬奇 我就来了

translation.en: [Shredder] You stupid little girl!
translation.zh: 你这个愚蠢的小女孩

translation.en: April!
translation.zh: 爱普尔

translation.en: -Sensei! -No, my son, stay back!
translation.zh: –师父–不 儿子 别过来

translation.en: Sensei!
translation.zh: 师父

translation.en: Sensei! Dad! Dad! What are you... What are you doing? Hide!
translation.zh: –师父 爸爸 你在干什么–躲起来

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [Splinter] Save yourselves!
translation.zh: 不 照顾好自己

translation.en: [Shredder] Children, drop your weapons,
translation.zh: 孩子们 放下武器

translation.en: or your father will die.
translation.zh: 否则你们的父亲就会死

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [Shredder] Where's the fourth? [Foot soldier] He's dead.
translation.zh: –还有一个呢–已经死了

translation.en: [Shredder] Destroy this place.
translation.zh: 毁掉这个地方

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Keep moving!
translation.zh: 继续走

translation.en: [Leonardo] Stay strong.
translation.zh: 坚强点儿

translation.en: Remember, pain's only in the mind.
translation.zh: 记住 疼痛只是一种感觉

translation.en: [Foot soldier 2] Move along! Go!
translation.zh: 往前走 快

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Troop, go! Move! Move!
translation.zh: 都快点儿 快

translation.en: [sighs] Splinter.
translation.zh: 斯普林特

translation.en: [Raphael] Sensei.
translation.zh: 师父

translation.en: Master.
translation.zh: 师父

translation.en: Let's get him to the needle room.
translation.zh: 快送他去针灸室

translation.en: Package is secured. En route.
translation.zh: 货物已经到手 在路上

translation.en: We're carrying three specimens
translation.zh: 现在我们手上有三个样本

translation.en: and will be arriving at the estate in approximately 40 minutes.
translation.zh: 大约40分钟后抵达

translation.en: Prepare the containment units.
translation.zh: 马上把隔离室准备好

translation.en: Inside those turtles
translation.zh: 在这些乌龟的体内

translation.en: is the most precious compound on Earth...
translation.zh: 有世界上最珍贵的物质

translation.en: mutagen.
translation.zh: 突变原

translation.en: And we will drain every last ounce of their blood to get it,
translation.zh: 我们要榨干他们身上的每一滴血

translation.en: even if it kills them.
translation.zh: 弄死也无所谓

translation.en: Get the first aid kit! On the shelf!
translation.zh: 把急救箱拿来 在架子上

translation.en: Hurry. Hurry.
translation.zh: 快 快点儿

translation.en: Raphael? I'm here.
translation.zh: -拉斐尔-我在这儿

translation.en: You must save your brothers.
translation.zh: 一定要救出你的兄弟

translation.en: Stop Shredder.
translation.zh: 阻止史莱德

translation.en: Sensei.
translation.zh: 师父

translation.en: It's some kind of a tracker.
translation.zh: 这是一种追踪器

translation.en: [Raphael] It's Donatello!
translation.zh: 是多尼的

translation.en: Go, Raphael.
translation.zh: 快去 拉斐尔

translation.en: Let's go save my brothers.
translation.zh: 我们去把兄弟们救出来

translation.en: We need a ride.
translation.zh: 得找辆车

translation.en: O'Neil!
translation.zh: 奥尼尔

translation.en: [April] Look, Vern, I need you to meet me at Cortlandt Alley in ten minutes, please.
translation.zh: 弗恩 十分钟内到寇特兰街跟我见面

translation.en: Wait, why?
translation.zh: 什么事

translation.en: I can't talk to you about it on the phone. Just promise me you're gonna be there.
translation.zh: 不能在电话里跟你说答应我一定要来

translation.en: What do you mean you can't talk about... You called-- -[line disconnects] -...me.
translation.zh: 什么叫不能说 是你找我的

translation.en: All right. Want me to meet you right now?
translation.zh: 好吧 让我马上见你

translation.en: I'll play your little game.
translation.zh: 那就陪你玩玩

translation.en: What's with the hat?
translation.zh: 为什么戴个帽子

translation.en: What is with the... [chuckles] I don't know,
translation.zh: 什么 这个 没事儿戴着玩

translation.en: it's a buddy of mine. It's just a goof.
translation.zh: 没事儿戴着玩

translation.en: What do you want to do? You wanna head downtown?
translation.zh: 你想去哪儿 是去市区吗？

translation.en: Eric Sacks is working with the head of the Foot Clan.
translation.zh: 萨克斯和大脚帮的老大是同伙

translation.en: They just kidnapped the vigilante turtles to take them to the Sacks estate.
translation.zh: 他们把忍者龟绑架到萨克斯庄园

translation.en: We need to go. Come on, Vern.
translation.zh: 我们得快点儿 走吧 弗恩

translation.en: Right, right, right. The turtles. I forgot.
translation.zh: 对 那些乌龟 我都忘了

translation.en: This is getting embarrassing. O'Neil,
translation.zh: 真让人尴尬 奥尼尔

translation.en: we're both consenting adults.
translation.zh: 我们都已经是成年人了

translation.en: We're both very good-looking. You're better, probably.
translation.zh: 我们都是帅哥 美女 你也许比我强点儿 不过也有待商榷

translation.en: That's up for debate.
translation.zh: 你也许比我强点儿 不过也有待商榷

translation.en: But the point is, we don't need to make up excuses
translation.zh: 关键是我们没必要 –为了约会编这么个理由–什么

translation.en: -to hang out with each other. -What?
translation.zh: –为了约会编这么个理由–什么

translation.en: You want to spend more time with me. I get it. I would too.
translation.zh: 你喜欢跟我在一起 我明白 我也是

translation.en: We need to get to the Sacks estate right now, Vern. Come on!
translation.zh: 我们必须赶快去萨克斯庄园 快点 弗恩 走吧

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about, O'Neil. "The Sacks estate with the vigilante..."
translation.zh: 行了 奥尼尔 你就别说那些乌龟被

translation.en: -What-- -Drive!
translation.zh: 开车

translation.en: You... You... You're a talking turtle.
translation.zh: 会说话的乌龟

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I'm a talking turtle,
translation.zh: 对 我是会说话的乌龟

translation.en: and you're a human nerd.
translation.zh: 你是人类的怪胎

translation.en: Now that we got that out of the way, hit it.
translation.zh: 明白了就快开车 快点儿

translation.en: I've never been accused of being a nerd before, but...
translation.zh: 还从来没有人叫我怪胎

translation.en: I'm sorry... How did you get in... How did he get in the...
translation.zh: 不好意思 你是怎么进来的

translation.en: Oh, my!
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Unbelievable. Let me look at you.
translation.zh: 真不可思议 让我好好看看你们

translation.en: I'm a hard guy to impress, but...
translation.zh: 我一向都是很冷静的

translation.en: this is just... [chuckling] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 但这次

translation.en: And we were gonna use rabbits! Can you imagine that?
translation.zh: 我们本来是想用兔子的你能想象得到吗？

translation.en: All we were trying to do is create an antidote.
translation.zh: 我们一直梦想着做出一种解药

translation.en: [Leonardo] For what?
translation.zh: 解什么的

translation.en: Say that again. I want to hear your voice.
translation.zh: 再说一次 我想听听你的声音

translation.en: [yelling] For what!
translation.zh: 解什么的

translation.en: Well, uh, we had this plan.
translation.zh: 我们曾有个计划

translation.en: A plan that we're ready to put back online today.
translation.zh: 而今天这个计划马上就可以重启了

translation.en: I'll show you. Karai, um... Show them.
translation.zh: 给你看一下 卡拉 演示一下

translation.en: Do you know my building, Sacks Tower?
translation.zh: 知道我盖的萨克斯大厦吗？

translation.en: Got that great big spire up on top?
translation.zh: 就是楼顶上尖尖的那个

translation.en: -That spire is filled... -[Foot soldier struggling] ...with tons of chemical toxins.
translation.zh: 那个尖顶里 装了几吨的化学毒素

translation.en: Bad stuff. That kinda bad.
translation.zh: 毒性很强 就是这么毒

translation.en: In a few hours,
translation.zh: 几个小时后

translation.en: Shredder is going to unleash all that stuff over the whole city.
translation.zh: 史莱德就会把这种毒素释放到整座城市

translation.en: The initial death toll
translation.zh: 最初的死亡人数

translation.en: will shake world governments to their core.
translation.zh: 会让各国政府都震惊不已

translation.en: In 30 days, the city of New York will be a quarantine zone.
translation.zh: 30天后 纽约将会被迫成为隔离区

translation.en: And that is where my company comes in.
translation.zh: 这时 我的公司就该上场了

translation.en: I'm going to save everyone with the antidote
translation.zh: 我将会拯救所有人 所用的解药

translation.en: that is made from the mutagen
translation.zh: 就是用你们体内血液里的

translation.en: that is oozing through your blood.
translation.zh: 突变原生产出来的

translation.en: The government will then send Sacks Industry a blank check,
translation.zh: 政府将给我一张支票 金额随我填

translation.en: and I'm going to be rich. Like, stupid rich.
translation.zh: 我会有很多钱 多到无法想象

translation.en: Shredder will force this city to live under our rule.
translation.zh: 史莱德会强迫这个城市 按我们的规则运行

translation.en: We will be gods.
translation.zh: 我们会变成神

translation.en: [Vern] Yeah, I've thought about... I've thought about doing,
translation.zh: 我曾经想过学习忍术 不是要当忍者

translation.en: not becoming a ninja, but I was doing a bunch of yoga
translation.zh: 我曾经想过学习忍术 不是要当忍者 不过 我练了很久的瑜珈

translation.en: for like, ten days at one point, and, uh, I pulled a hamstring.
translation.zh: 大概有十天吧 然后就拉伤了肌腱

translation.en: -There's the gate right there. -There it is.
translation.zh: 那就是大门 看见了

translation.en: [Raphael] Ram the gate.
translation.zh: 撞门进去

translation.en: "Ram the gate"? This is Channel 6 property.
translation.zh: 撞门 这车是六频道的财产

translation.en: [yelling] I said ram the gate!
translation.zh: 我叫你撞门进去

translation.en: All right, everybody, strap in!
translation.zh: 好吧 大家都坐稳了

translation.en: [Vern] Oh, shit! [Raphael] Go, go, go, go!
translation.zh: 该死 快开枪 开枪

translation.en: Follow me!
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: I'll take this canister to New York to withdraw the mutagen.
translation.zh: 我带这一罐去纽约抽取突变原

translation.en: Make sure that you drain all their blood.
translation.zh: 一定要把他们的血全都榨干

translation.en: Time to take a bite out of the Big Apple.
translation.zh: 该去咬一口大苹果了

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Hey! Get out of here!
translation.zh: 马上离开这里

translation.en: Leo!
translation.zh: 达芬奇

translation.en: About time.
translation.zh: 还算及时

translation.en: [Shredder] Raphael.
translation.zh: 拉斐尔

translation.en: Glad you could join us.
translation.zh: 欢迎你自投罗网

translation.en: The fourth cage is for you.
translation.zh: 第四个笼子是留给你用的

translation.en: That's harsh, man.
translation.zh: 好惨 兄弟

translation.en: [Shredder] The rat did not teach you well!
translation.zh: 那只老鼠 就把你教成这样

translation.en: Raphael!
translation.zh: 拉斐尔

translation.en: [Shredder] You. [Raphael] Focus on me.
translation.zh: 你 冲我来吧

translation.en: Three... Four total turtles.
translation.zh: 有三 四只乌龟

translation.en: One's fighting a robot samurai. Why not?
translation.zh: 一只在对抗机器武士 真酷

translation.en: Donnie!
translation.zh: 多尼

translation.en: [April] Donnie! What do I do?
translation.zh: 多尼 我该怎么做

translation.en: -[softly] Adrenaline. -What?
translation.zh: -肾上腺素-什么？

translation.en: Adrenaline.
translation.zh: 肾上腺素

translation.en: Adrenaline.
translation.zh: 肾上腺素 好的

translation.en: Adrenaline.
translation.zh: 肾上腺素

translation.en: He's going to kill him.
translation.zh: 他要被杀了

translation.en: Get up!
translation.zh: 起来啊

translation.en: It's working.
translation.zh: 起作用了

translation.en: I think we should move.
translation.zh: 我们得离远一点儿

translation.en: Oh! I feel really good right now! I feel like running!
translation.zh: 我终于出来了 –感觉真好 我想跑步–我想打扫卫生

translation.en: I feel like cleaning! Who wants to clean the dojo?
translation.zh: –感觉真好 我想跑步–我想打扫卫生 来打扫道场

translation.en: I'll clean the dojo!
translation.zh: 来打扫道场

translation.en: Endorphins! Endorphins! [Leonardo] We got to get Raph!
translation.zh: 我的荷尔蒙过量了 快去救拉斐尔

translation.en: [all] Raph! Raph!
translation.zh: 拉斐尔

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Are you okay? Are you dead? Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？ 死了吗？

translation.en: Come on. Come on. -[Michelangelo] We really gotta go! -Go where?
translation.zh: –快走–去哪儿啊

translation.en: -Sacks Tower! -New York City! Times Square!
translation.zh: 萨克斯大厦 在纽约时代广场

translation.en: Shredder's going to release a toxin!
translation.zh: 史莱德要释放一种毒素

translation.en: It's gonna poison the whole city!
translation.zh: 所有人都会中毒

translation.en: And Sacks is gonna sell the antidote!
translation.zh: 然后萨克斯再出来卖解药

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Made from the mutagen that's in our blood!
translation.zh: 用我们血液里的突变原做的

translation.en: So we've got to get going now!
translation.zh: 所以必须阻止他们

translation.en: Good. Let's do it for sensei.
translation.zh: –好 去为师父报仇–好的 走吧

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Okay. We're going! Everybody calm down! Look how calm I am!
translation.zh: 大家冷静点儿 看我多冷静啊

translation.en: [Leonardo] We gotta move. Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们得快点儿 快走

translation.en: Sacks is airborne!
translation.zh: 萨克斯坐飞机走了

translation.en: Flight time to Manhattan, 19 minutes.
translation.zh: 飞到曼哈顿需要19分钟

translation.en: Get us out of here, Donnie.
translation.zh: 想想办法 多纳泰罗

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, they have guns!
translation.zh: 天哪 他们有枪

translation.en: -[gunfire] -Get down! Get down!
translation.zh: 趴下

translation.en: Ha! Are you guys okay?
translation.zh: 大家都没事吧

translation.en: -We're bulletproof. -Sweet!
translation.zh: –我们有防弹龟壳–太帅啦

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Advance and engage!
translation.zh: 全火力推进

translation.en: -Can you drive that truck? -Yeah!
translation.zh: -你会开那种卡车吗？-会

translation.en: We're on, Raph. Ready?
translation.zh: 跟着拉斐尔 预备

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 上车

translation.en: Everybody in the truck! We gotta go, go, go! Move!
translation.zh: 大家快上车 动作快点儿 快

translation.en: Vern, you know how to drive this, right?
translation.zh: 你到底会开这种车吗？ 会

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Just gotta hotwire this thing, I guess.
translation.zh: 只要把引擎发动起来就行了 不过就是红线蓝线的问题
