translation.en: Classic blue wire/red wire situation.
translation.zh: 不过就是红线蓝线的问题

translation.en: -Keys! -Yeah. Keys are better.
translation.zh: –钥匙–有钥匙更好

translation.en: -Drive! -I'm on it!
translation.zh: -快开车！-我在开

translation.en: [Raphael] Come on, come on!
translation.zh: 快点儿 别像驾校教练那样冲我嚷嚷

translation.en: That's all I need, is a backseat-driving talking turtle!
translation.zh: 别像驾校教练那样冲我嚷嚷

translation.en: -[Foot soldier] Let's go! -[Foot soldier 2] Move!
translation.zh: –我们走–快

translation.en: -Jackal-One-Tango, on your 12! -[Foot soldier over radio] Copy that.
translation.zh: –1号车 在你正前方–收到

translation.en: I shouldn't have doubted you. Sorry I didn't stick up for you.
translation.zh: 我不应该质疑你 抱歉没替你说话

translation.en: I can't believe that you're not crazy! How crazy is that?
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你没疯 这太疯狂了

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Target, 12 o'clock!
translation.zh: 目标在正前方

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Where are we going, guys?
translation.zh: 我们要去哪儿 伙计们

translation.en: Donnie, what's the fastest way back to Manhattan?
translation.zh: 多尼 去曼哈顿怎么走最快

translation.en: We just need to stay on this road.
translation.zh: 沿着这条路走就行

translation.en: If we can get to the maintenance hatch at the bottom of the hill,
translation.zh: 在山脚下有个维修人员专用的入口

translation.en: there's a sewer line 2.4 miles from here.
translation.zh: 离下水道网只有4公里

translation.en: Mikey! Let them know up there! I'm on it!
translation.zh: –麦奇 快告诉他们–没问题

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -Vern, go, go, go, go, go! -I'm on it!
translation.zh: –弗恩 快 上去 快–我在试

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Stop!
translation.zh: 抓住他们

translation.en: -Vern, hit the brakes! -Wrong way! Wrong way!
translation.zh: –快刹车–那没有用

translation.en: [Foot soldier] Go around! Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 快追 快

translation.en: -Leo, move, move! -What?
translation.zh: –达芬奇 闪开–什么

translation.en: [Vern] Opposite, opposite!
translation.zh: 转过去

translation.en: How far off course are we?
translation.zh: 我们离目的地还有多远

translation.en: Actually, we're on a bit of a shortcut.
translation.zh: 我们走的是最短的路

translation.en: But we need to keep going down. Straight down.
translation.zh: 只要顺着山坡往下冲 就到了

translation.en: Hey! Just keep going straight!
translation.zh: 一直往前开就对了

translation.en: What's up, angel cakes?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？ 亲爱的

translation.en: Fire!
translation.zh: 开火

translation.en: Guys, Leo's in trouble!
translation.zh: 兄弟们 达芬奇有麻烦了

translation.en: My shell's cracked. Just tape it up.
translation.zh: 我的龟壳裂了 快帮我粘好

translation.en: Allow me to be the bad-ass for once.
translation.zh: 该轮到我去当一次狠人了

translation.en: Hang on, Leo. Disengaging.
translation.zh: 撑住 达芬奇 我帮你解开

translation.en: God, I've always wanted to try this.
translation.zh: 我一直想试这招

translation.en: I got you, brother. One car down, two to go.
translation.zh: 我来了兄弟 干掉一个 还剩两个

translation.en: Mikey!
translation.zh: –麦奇–好了 知道了

translation.en: All right, that's it. I'll take it from here!
translation.zh: –麦奇–好了 知道了 让我来搞定他

translation.en: Raph, I'm driving! Yeah! [laughing]
translation.zh: 我会开车

translation.en: O'Neil, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 奥尼尔 你在做什么

translation.en: Yeah, that's good. Make sure you're getting everything.
translation.zh: 对 就这样 别着急 多照几张

translation.en: Vern! Vern!
translation.zh: 弗恩

translation.en: O'Neil! Give me your arm!
translation.zh: 奥尼尔 把手给我

translation.en: Vern!
translation.zh: 弗恩

translation.en: Avalanche!
translation.zh: 雪崩来了

translation.en: [Donatello] Come on, Leo, wake up!
translation.zh: 醒醒达芬奇 快醒醒

translation.en: Yeah! If you wake up, I promise to do anything you say.
translation.zh: 只要你醒来我保证什么都听你的

translation.en: Guys, Shredder's chopper is 20 miles
translation.zh: 兄弟们 史莱德的直升机

translation.en: outside of New York City airspace!
translation.zh: 兄弟们 史莱德的直升机 离纽约只剩32公里了

translation.en: Thanks for the traffic update, Donnie.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的实时路况 多尼

translation.en: You doing sports and weather next?
translation.zh: 接下来是体育和天气预报吗？

translation.en: If you're gonna be nasty about it, then I guess you don't want to know
translation.zh: 既然你不喜欢我猜你可能也不想知道

translation.en: that there's a 500-foot drop-off in 53 seconds!
translation.zh: 53秒后我们会下坠152米

translation.en: -Are you saying there's-- -A cliff!
translation.zh: -你的意思是…-悬崖！

translation.en: We gotta get April out of there. Raph, heads up!
translation.zh: 得赶快把爱普尔救出来 拉斐尔 配合我

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Don't forget that old guy!
translation.zh: 别忘了那个老家伙

translation.en: Hi. Change of plans. Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 达芬奇 计划有变 –该死–大家快趴下 趴下

translation.en: Guys, get down! Get down!
translation.zh: –该死–大家快趴下 趴下

translation.en: [Donatello] Twelve seconds and we're going over!
translation.zh: 还有12秒我们就没命了

translation.en: Hey, Donnie, do that fancy slingshot thing!
translation.zh: 多尼 快用你最拿手的绝招吧

translation.en: We got to take Little Miss Sunshine out.
translation.zh: 得先把那个小美女解决掉

translation.en: Batter up!
translation.zh: 球员就位

translation.en: Grab on.
translation.zh: 抓紧了

translation.en: Mikey! Grab the cable!
translation.zh: 麦奇 快抓住绳子

translation.en: I got it! I got it!
translation.zh: 抓住了 我抓住了

translation.en: Hold on, hold on.
translation.zh: 抓住

translation.en: No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [sobbing] Oh, no... Poor Leo, April...
translation.zh: 不 可怜的达芬奇 爱普尔

translation.en: and that other guy. They were so young, so beautiful.
translation.zh: 还有那家伙 那么年轻 那么漂亮

translation.en: [Raphael] They ain't dead, numb nuts.
translation.zh: 他们没死呢 傻瓜

translation.en: Oh. Right on.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: I hope you got a parachute under that shell.
translation.zh: 希望你的龟壳里有降落伞

translation.en: Hey, guys! It's the maintenance hatch! Our ticket home!
translation.zh: 伙计们 入口在这里 可以回家了

translation.en: [Leonardo] A little help, please!
translation.zh: 能帮个忙吗？ 谢谢

translation.en: [Donatello] Guys, we gotta hustle. Shredder's over New York City.
translation.zh: 伙计们 我们得快点儿 史莱德已经飞到纽约了

translation.en: [Sacks on radio] Sensei, the mutagen is four minutes out.
translation.zh: 师父 4分钟后分离出突变原

translation.en: Moving forward as planned.
translation.zh: 计划进行的很顺利

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Please keep your arms and legs inside the shell at all times.
translation.zh: 提醒您请勿将手脚伸到壳外

translation.en: [Donatello] Satellite imagery shows
translation.zh: 卫星图像显示

translation.en: Shredder's reached the top of Sacks Tower.
translation.zh: 史莱德已经到达萨克斯大厦的楼顶了

translation.en: If that's where he's releasing the toxin from...
translation.zh: 如果他在那里释放毒素的话

translation.en: [Donatello] It's gonna spread all over the city!
translation.zh: 会扩散到整个城市

translation.en: -[Raphael] We need to... -[Donatello] ...break a left!
translation.zh: 我们现在该左转

translation.en: [Leonardo] All right, listen up.
translation.zh: 好了 都听着

translation.en: We gotta find the elevators and get up to the roof.
translation.zh: 我们得找电梯上到楼顶去

translation.en: You guys get out of here. Get to a safe distance.
translation.zh: 你们两个离开 去安全的地方躲起来

translation.en: No, no, we can go find Sacks
translation.zh: 不 我们可以去找萨克斯

translation.en: and get our hands on the mutagen as a contingency plan,
translation.zh: 把突变原抢回来 当然是做为备选计划

translation.en: just in case... You know.
translation.zh: 当然是做为备选计划

translation.en: Thanks for the vote of confidence.
translation.zh: 多谢你对我们的信任

translation.en: If we don't make it back, bring the mutagen to Splinter.
translation.zh: 如果我们失败 把突变原给斯普林特

translation.en: It can save his life.
translation.zh: 这能救他的命

translation.en: Sacks' laboratory's on the 36th floor.
translation.zh: 萨克斯的实验室在36楼

translation.en: I've already disabled the security system.
translation.zh: 我已经搞定了安保系统

translation.en: Oh, and, uh...
translation.zh: 那么 祝你好运

translation.en: If I don't return, remember me, April.
translation.zh: 如果我回不来 别忘了我 爱普尔

translation.en: You can always find me in here.
translation.zh: 我永远都在你的心里

translation.en: You're a complicated chick.
translation.zh: 你还真挺复杂

translation.en: Elevator's just around this corner.
translation.zh: 对 我确定电梯就在转角

translation.en: All right, guys, listen up. We stick to my plan and we won't fail.
translation.zh: 伙计们 都听着 按我的计划行动 绝对不会失败

translation.en: Fan out in three, two, one.
translation.zh: 三个数 3 2 1

translation.en: Not the elevator. Nope.
translation.zh: –根本不是电梯–不是

translation.en: [Sacks] The first vial is filling with antidote now.
translation.zh: 第一瓶解药已经注满了

translation.en: [Shredder] Initiating the toxin release procedure.
translation.zh: 可以开启毒素释放进程了

translation.en: ♪ MC Mikey ♪
translation.zh: MC 麦奇

translation.en: [Leonardo] Ready, stance!
translation.zh: 预备 摆姿势

translation.en: Hey, Mikey, remember that thing you used to say when we were kids?
translation.zh: 麦奇 记得小时候你常喊的那句话吗？

translation.en: You made me promise never to say it again.
translation.zh: 你要我保证不再喊的

translation.en: Forget about that.
translation.zh: 就当我没说过

translation.en: Still got one in the tank?
translation.zh: 想不想再喊一下

translation.en: I've been holding it in for years.
translation.zh: 我已经想了很多年了

translation.en: Wait, guys, we need a plan! -[Michelangelo] Cowabunga! -[turtles grunting]
translation.zh: –伙计们 应该先–卡哇邦嘎

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Leo!
translation.zh: 达芬奇

translation.en: Yeah, we got a 10-10. Debris falling from the building.
translation.zh: 这里有事故发生 大楼上有碎物掉落

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: [Donatello] I got this, guys. I'll take him. Come on!
translation.zh: 这里交给我了 瞧好吧 来啊

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Oh, no, you don't!
translation.zh: 不 不可能

translation.en: Seriously, you two... You're adorable, really.
translation.zh: 说真的 你们俩真可爱

translation.en: I could just pinch your cheeks.
translation.zh: 真的 我还真想陪你们玩玩

translation.en: [Donatello] Guys, he's coming, he's coming.
translation.zh: 那家伙过来了

translation.en: Guys!
translation.zh: 伙计们

translation.en: -[Michelangelo] Donnie! -[screaming]
translation.zh: 多尼

translation.en: [Donatello] Come on, come on! [Raphael] Hold on, Leo!
translation.zh: 抓紧了 坚持住 达芬奇

translation.en: [Sacks] I understand a girl with dead daddy issues. I do.
translation.zh: 我了解一个女孩失去父亲的心情 卤代烷1301手动释放装置按住按钮 卤代烷即出

translation.en: But you're not gonna stop me.
translation.zh: 真的 但你阻止不了我

translation.en: This is history repeating itself.
translation.zh: 历史总是会不断重演

translation.en: Your father walked in on me, April, just like you did.
translation.zh: 你爸爸发现了我的秘密 现在又轮到你了

translation.en: It took a few less bullets to take him down, though.
translation.zh: 不过杀他可没用多少子弹

translation.en: [whispers] You killed my father.
translation.zh: 你杀了我爸爸

translation.en: [officer] Move! Move! Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 行动 快

translation.en: [Raphael] Come on, guys.
translation.zh: 快啊 伙计们

translation.en: Got you!
translation.zh: 我抓住了

translation.en: [Shredder] Enough! The lesson is over.
translation.zh: 够了 今天的课结束了

translation.en: Ugh! We're getting our asses kicked out there.
translation.zh: 我们被收拾的好惨啊

translation.en: We only got 50 more seconds before the toxin's released.
translation.zh: 还剩下50秒毒素就要释放出去了

translation.en: -Who wants to play Buck-Buck? -Buck-Buck?
translation.zh: 谁想玩人体跳箱 人体跳箱

translation.en: -[Leonardo] What? -Buck-Buck. Tony-on-a-Pony.
translation.zh: 什么 人体跳箱 也叫人体鞍马

translation.en: Some people call it Johnnie-on-a-Rock.
translation.zh: 也可以叫罗汉登天梯

translation.en: [Leonardo] Wait. Yeah. Let's play Buck-Buck.
translation.zh: –等等–好吧 那我们就玩一次

translation.en: -[Donatello] But why would we... -No.
translation.zh: -可为什么不…-不

translation.en: We do what Leo says. Lead the way.
translation.zh: 就按达芬奇说的 你先来

translation.en: O'Neil!
translation.zh: 奥尼尔

translation.en: Cowabunga.
translation.zh: 卡哇邦嘎

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧

translation.en: Look, just go get some help and take the mutagen with you.
translation.zh: 你快带上突变原去叫救援

translation.en: -Just go. Go! -No!
translation.zh: 快走 走

translation.en: Just another day in the life of a man of action. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这一天的经历还真够丰富的

translation.en: Oh! No, I'm not getting up.
translation.zh: 我们 我动不了了

translation.en: You know how to use this thing?
translation.zh: 知道怎么操作吗？

translation.en: It's a simple command-line interface.
translation.zh: 是简单的命令接口

translation.en: No one's used this code in 15 years.
translation.zh: 已经好多年没人用了

translation.en: I mean, I've read about it online.
translation.zh: 我在网上见到过

translation.en: But these kind of things take time.
translation.zh: 但是 这很花时间的

translation.en: Thinking there was no way I'd ever be in a position
translation.zh: 具体时间我记不清楚了 不过没关系 就算想不起来也没事

translation.en: where the fate of an entire city... [continues indistinctly]
translation.zh: 只要知道这种代码的原理 直接让系统崩溃就行了

translation.en: I'll buy you some time.
translation.zh: 我真的好紧张 我给你争取时间

translation.en: [female voice] Toxin disbursement in five, four... ...three,
translation.zh: 毒素释放倒计时 五 四 三 二

translation.en: Bam! System disabled! Who wants Italian?
translation.zh: 系统崩溃了 谁吃比萨 我请客

translation.en: I'm buying. Tiramisu for everybody.
translation.zh: 谁吃比萨 我请客 提拉米苏人人有份

translation.en: [Leonardo] Fall in!
translation.zh: 快过来

translation.en: Hold on! Hold it, hold it!
translation.zh: 撑住

translation.en: If the spire falls and the toxin makes ground impact,
translation.zh: 塔如果倒了 让毒素摔到地面

translation.en: it'll contaminate a ten-block radius!
translation.zh: 十个街区都会被污染

translation.en: What are the odds of us stopping that from happening?
translation.zh: 我们成功阻止的概率有多大
百分之零点零零零零零零零零零零三

translation.en: I'll take it. Nobody moves, no matter what.
translation.zh: 我认了 大家别放手 无论什么情况

translation.en: [Michelangelo] But, Leo...
translation.zh: 可是达芬奇

translation.en: [Leonardo] I said nobody moves!
translation.zh: 我叫你们别放手

translation.en: Leo, I'm letting go!
translation.zh: 达芬奇 我不行了

translation.en: Shredder!
translation.zh: 史莱德

translation.en: This is all that's left! [Shredder] Little girl.
translation.zh: –突变原在我这儿–臭丫头

translation.en: That belongs to me.
translation.zh: 那是我的东西

translation.en: [Leonardo] Hold on! Hold on! Hold it!
translation.zh: 撑住

translation.en: [officer] Get back! All the way back!
translation.zh: 退后 赶紧退后

translation.en: April! [Raphael] Come on, guys.
translation.zh: –爱普尔–快点儿 伙计们

translation.en: -[yelps] -No! [Raphael] April!
translation.zh: 不 爱普尔

translation.en: [Leonardo] Got you, Raph.
translation.zh: 我抓住你了

translation.en: Hold on! Hold on. April.
translation.zh: 抓紧了 别放手 爱普尔

translation.en: [Raphael] I got you.
translation.zh: 我抓住你了

translation.en: Swing me towards him! Do it.
translation.zh: -把我往他那儿甩-动手

translation.en: [Raphael] Leo!
translation.zh: 达芬奇

translation.en: That's my girl. [sighs]
translation.zh: 真是我的妞

translation.en: I think this is it, guys!
translation.zh: 我们完蛋了 伙计们

translation.en: Does anyone have anything they want to say?
translation.zh: 大家还有什么要说的吗？

translation.en: Donnie? I'm the one who licks the icing
translation.zh: 多尼 是我把果酱馅饼外面的糖舔掉

translation.en: off the Pop-Tarts every morning
translation.zh: 多尼 是我把果酱馅饼外面的糖舔掉 然后又偷偷放回盒子里的

translation.en: and puts them back in the box.
translation.zh: 然后又偷偷放回盒子里的

translation.en: I so did not understand the ending of Lost.
translation.zh: 我不明白《迷失》的结局怎么是那样的

translation.en: [Leonardo] Raph? I just, uh...
translation.zh: 拉斐尔 我想说

translation.en: If this is our last moment together,
translation.zh: 如果这是我们相处的最后时刻

translation.en: I just want you guys to know I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我想跟你们大家说声 对不起

translation.en: I'm sorry I was so hard on you.
translation.zh: 我平时对你们太严格了

translation.en: Every time I pushed you, I... I threatened you,
translation.zh: 每一次我逼你们 威胁你们

translation.en: I yelled at you, I pushed you beyond your limits,
translation.zh: 吼你们 挑战你们的极限

translation.en: it was because I believe in you!
translation.zh: 是因为我相信你们

translation.en: I believe in each one of you!
translation.zh: 我相信你们每一个人

translation.en: I believe in your spirit, and your intelligence,
translation.zh: 我相信你们的精神 你们的智慧和你们的潜力

translation.en: and your potential.
translation.zh: 你们的智慧和你们的潜力

translation.en: And every time I talked about walking away,
translation.zh: 其实每次我跟你们说我要离开

translation.en: it was because I was scared!
translation.zh: 都是因为我很害怕

translation.en: I just didn't think I was good enough to stand next to you
translation.zh: 我觉得我自己不配跟你们站在一起

translation.en: and call you brothers, and say to you,
translation.zh: 称你们为兄弟 跟你们说 我爱你们

translation.en: "I love you!"
translation.zh: 跟你们说 我爱你们

translation.en: I love you guys so much!
translation.zh: 我真的非常爱你们

translation.en: [Donatello] Raph? We made it.
translation.zh: 拉斐尔 没事了

translation.en: Are you crying?
translation.zh: 你哭了

translation.en: No, ding-dong. It's just a little dusty out here.
translation.zh: 我没哭 是迷眼睛了 笨蛋

translation.en: [Donatello] Okay, the mutagen is now entering his bloodstream.
translation.zh: 好了 突变原进入他的血液里了

translation.en: Master Splinter? Nothing's happening.
translation.zh: –斯普林特师父–好像没反应

translation.en: Why isn't it working yet?
translation.zh: 为什么没效果呢？

translation.en: [weakly] Mikey... -[Michelangelo] Huh? -Mikey, come closer.
translation.zh: 麦奇 你过来

translation.en: What did he say? What did he say?
translation.zh: 他说什么 说了什么

translation.en: He said, "Please get your knee off my chest."
translation.zh: 他说不要用膝盖压着我胸口

translation.en: -[chuckling in relief] -Sensei!
translation.zh: 师父

translation.en: You're alive! It worked!
translation.zh: –你没事了–有效果了

translation.en: I'm sorry. This was all my fault.
translation.zh: 对不起 都是我的错

translation.en: You were right. We weren't ready.
translation.zh: 没错 我们还没学会

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: It was I who wasn't ready to let you go.
translation.zh: 是我还没学会要放手

translation.en: All you needed was to discover
translation.zh: 你们已经用行动证明了

translation.en: that your true power lies in believing in one another.
translation.zh: 真正的力量存在于对彼此的信任之中

translation.en: There she is. New York's secret weapon.
translation.zh: 你来啦 纽约的秘密武器

translation.en: How's your arm, Vern?
translation.zh: 好些了吗？

translation.en: Well, it wouldn't be much use in a fight.
translation.zh: 打架肯定是不行了

translation.en: Not that I was much use before, but...
translation.zh: 以前我也没怎么打过架

translation.en: -Did you get a new car? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -买了辆新车-是啊

translation.en: You're looking at the new Fenwick Express.
translation.zh: 这是最新款的弗恩快车

translation.en: Pretty sweet, huh? Kind of an upgrade.
translation.zh: 感觉不错吧 升级版的

translation.en: I figured I'd need new wheels after my old work vehicle went boom.
translation.zh: 采访车毁了后 我觉得需要一部新车

translation.en: Yeah, Channel 6 gave it to me.
translation.zh: 六频道给我买的

translation.en: They said don't put a scratch on it,
translation.zh: 他们说刮花都不许有

translation.en: but, like, lightning's going to strike twice?
translation.zh: 我想 应该是大难不死必有后福吧

translation.en: So, is that why you called me here,
translation.zh: 那今晚 你叫我来这儿

translation.en: to talk about your new car?
translation.zh: 就是来看新车

translation.en: I know that you're not exactly a fancy restaurant kind of girl,
translation.zh: 我知道你不是那种 喜欢去高级餐厅的女生 所以我想

translation.en: so I figured a creepy underpass in an abandoned neighborhood
translation.zh: 喜欢去高级餐厅的女生 所以我想 在午夜空荡荡的高架桥下约会

translation.en: in the middle of the night was more your speed. I wanted you to be comfortable.
translation.zh: 可能更对你胃口 让你更自在些

translation.en: [beat-boxing] DJ Mikey in the house!
translation.zh: 我是DJ麦奇 我在陪着你

translation.en: What are you guys doing here?
translation.zh: 你们怎么跑到这儿来了

translation.en: We figured we owed you a thanks for keeping our secret.
translation.zh: 来跟你说 谢谢你帮我们保守秘密

translation.en: You know, you had a lot to gain from telling people about us,
translation.zh: 把我们公之于众 你会得到好处

translation.en: but you had our backs.
translation.zh: 但你没这么做

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause that's what family's for, Raph.
translation.zh: 是啊 家人就该这样 拉斐尔

translation.en: So you guys are driving now?
translation.zh: 你们现在能开车了

translation.en: Yeah, man. I pimped this bad boy out.
translation.zh: 对 我加上了很多好东西

translation.en: Got a 42-inch plasma with the NBA package, shave ice machine,
translation.zh: 可以收看NBA的42寸液晶电视 还有刨冰机和7．1声道数码环绕音响

translation.en: 7.1 digital surround sound.
translation.zh: 还有刨冰机和7．1声道数码环绕音响

translation.en: Check the bass, brah.
translation.zh: 听听这重低音

translation.en: My bad. I'm still figuring out the buttons.
translation.zh: 都怪我 我没搞清楚开关

translation.en: That was my new Fenwick Express!
translation.zh: 那是我的新版弗恩快车

translation.en: I just... I just got that.
translation.zh: 那可是新车啊

translation.en: We better get out of here. Want a ride home?
translation.zh: 最好快离开这里 要搭车吗？

translation.en: You know what? I think we're gonna take the subway.
translation.zh: 算了吧 我们还是坐地铁吧

translation.en: We're going to take the subway.
translation.zh: 走吧 弗恩 我们去坐地铁

translation.en: [Michelangelo] You sure? I got a real nice song that's all cued up.
translation.zh: 你确定？我准备了一首很棒的歌送给你

translation.en: -It's special, girl. -[Raphael] No, don't.
translation.zh: 你确定？我准备了一首很棒的歌送给你 –不 算了–给我们

translation.en: -For us. -[Leonardo] Come on, Mikey.
translation.zh: –不 算了–给我们 –别闹了 麦奇–你答应过的 我唱了

translation.en: [Donatello] No, no, no, Mikey, you promised.
translation.zh: –别闹了 麦奇–你答应过的 我唱了

translation.en: [Michelangelo] It's happening.
translation.zh: 歌词大意 想象我和你 我愿意

translation.en: -♪ Imagine me and you I do ♪ -Stop singing right now.
translation.zh: 你唱的很难听

translation.en: -♪ I think about you Day and night ♪ -[turtles clamoring]
translation.zh: 我日夜想着你 不要唱了 太难听了

translation.en: ♪ It's only right To think about... ♪
translation.zh: 想起你 心里多甜蜜 太难听了 别唱了 我的进步还是很大的

translation.en: [Michelangelo] I'm making really good headway!
translation.zh: 我的进步还是很大的

translation.en: [turtles] Shut up, Mikey!
translation.zh: 住嘴 麦奇

translation.en: -[song playing on stereo] -♪ I can't see me Loving nobody but you ♪
translation.zh: 我的眼里没有别人 只有你

translation.en: ♪ For all my life ♪
translation.zh: 一生一世

translation.en: ♪ When you're with me, baby ♪
translation.zh: 跟你在一起时 宝贝儿 天空都格外的美丽

translation.en: ♪ The skies'll be blue For all my life! ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝儿 天空都格外的美丽 一生一世
